summary.span: 返回定期付息有价证券的应计利息。

span.span: Returns the accrued interest for a security that pays periodic interest.

para.span: 重要提示：日期应该使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

para.span: 下表描述了可用于 的值。

0 or omitted

description.span: 美国（美国证券交易商协会）30/360

span.span: US (NASD) 30/360
Actual/actual
Actual/360
Actual/365
European 30/360

para.span: 以下列表包含使用 ACCRINTM 时要注意的信息：

span.span: The following list contains information to be aware of when working with ACCRINTM:

description.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日是序列号 1，2008 年 1 月 1 日是序列号 39,448，这是因为它距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900.

description.span: Issue、maturity 和 basis 将被截尾取整。

span.span: Issue, maturity, and basis are truncated to integers.

description.span: 如果 issue 或 maturity 是无效的日期，则 ACCRINTM 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If issue or maturity is not a valid date, ACCRINTM will generate an error.

description.span: 如果 rate ≤ 0 或 par ≤ 0，则 ACCRINTM 将产生一个错误。

span.span: If rate ≤ 0 or if par ≤ 0, ACCRINTM will generate an error.

description.span: 如果 basis < 0 或 basis > 4，ACCRINTM 将生成错误。

span.span: If basis < 0 or if basis > 4, ACCRINTM will generate an error.

description.span: 如果 issue ≥ maturity，则 ACCRINTM 将产生一个错误。

span.span: If issue ≥ maturity, ACCRINTM will generate an error.
ACCRINTM is calculated as follows:

para.span: 其中：

span.span: where:

para.span: A = 按月计数的累算天数。

span.span: A = Number of accrued days counted according to a monthly basis.

para.span: 对于到期日的利息，使用从发行日到到期日的天数。

span.span: For interest at maturity items, the number of days from the issue date to the maturity date is used.

para.span: D = 按年计算。

span.span: D = Annual Year Basis.

param.name: Arg1

span.span: The cost of the asset.

param.span: 资产的购买日。

span.span: The date of the purchase of the asset.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: 第一个结算期的结束日期。

span.span: The date of the end of the first period.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: 资产在寿命结束时的残值。

span.span: The salvage value at the end of the life of the asset.

param.name: Arg5

span.span: The period.

param.name: Arg6
param.span: 折旧率。

span.span: The rate of depreciation.

param.name: Arg7
param.span: 要使用的年基准数。

span.span: The year basis to be used.

summary.span: 返回每个结算期的折旧值。

span.span: Returns the depreciation for each accounting period.

summary.span: 此函数为法国会计系统提供。

span.span: This function is provided for the French accounting system.

para.span: 如果某项资产是在结算期的中期购入的，则应考虑按比例折旧。

span.span: If an asset is purchased in the middle of the accounting period, the prorated depreciation is taken into account.

para.span: 该方法与 方法类似，不同点不同，根据资产生命周期，在计算中应用折旧系数。下表介绍了在 中使用的值 。

span.span: The method is similar to , except that a depreciation coefficient is applied in the calculation depending on the life of the assets.The following table describes the values used in .
0 or omitted
360 days (NASD method)
Actual
365 days in a year
360 days in a year (European method)

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 此函数将返回折旧值，截止到资产寿命的最后一个期间，或直到累积折旧值大于资产原值减去残值后所得的结果。

span.span: This function will return the depreciation until the last period of the life of the assets or until the cumulated value of depreciation is greater than the cost of the assets minus the salvage value.

para.span: 折旧系数为：

span.span: The depreciation coefficients are:
Between 3 and 4 years
Between 5 and 6 years
More than 6 years

para.span: 最后一个期间之前的那个期间的折旧率将增加到 50%，最后一个期间的折旧率将增加到 100%。

span.span: The depreciation rate will grow to 50 percent for the period preceding the last period and will grow to 100 percent for the last period.

para.span: 如果资产的寿命在 0（零）到 1、1 到 2、2 到 3 或 4 到 5 之间，则将返回错误值 #NUM!。

span.span: If the life of assets is between 0 (zero) and 1, 1 and 2, 2 and 3, or 4 and 5, the #NUM! error value is returned.

summary.span: 如果 其 所有参数都为 true，则返回 true;如果 一 个或多个参数为 false，则返回 false 。

span.span: Returns true if all its arguments are true; returns false if one or more argument is false.

span.span: Returns the arctangent, or inverse tangent, of the specified x- and y-coordinates. The arctangent is the angle from the x-axis to a line containing the origin (0, 0) and a point with coordinates (x_num, y_num). The angle is given in radians between -pi and pi, excluding -pi.

span.span: Atan2(a,b) equals Atan(b/a), except that a can equal 0 in Atan2.

para.span: 如果两 者 均为 0，则 Atan2 将返回错误值。

span.span: If both and are 0, Atan2 returns an error value.

para.span: 若要以度表示反正切值，请将结果乘以 180/PI ( ) 或使用 该方法。

span.span: To express the arctangent in degrees, multiply the result by 180/PI( ) or use the method.

Public Function Average (Arg1 As Object, Optional Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object, Optional Arg4 As Object, Optional Arg5 As Object, Optional Arg6 As Object, Optional Arg7 As Object, Optional Arg8 As Object, Optional Arg9 As Object, Optional Arg10 As Object, Optional Arg11 As Object, Optional Arg12 As Object, Optional Arg13 As Object, Optional Arg14 As Object, Optional Arg15 As Object, Optional Arg16 As Object, Optional Arg17 As Object, Optional Arg18 As Object, Optional Arg19 As Object, Optional Arg20 As Object, Optional Arg21 As Object, Optional Arg22 As Object, Optional Arg23 As Object, Optional Arg24 As Object, Optional Arg25 As Object, Optional Arg26 As Object, Optional Arg27 As Object, Optional Arg28 As Object, Optional Arg29 As Object, Optional Arg30 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: 要求其平均值的 1 到 30 个数值参数。

span.span: 1 to 30 numeric arguments for which you want the average.

summary.span: 返回参数的平均值（算术平均值）。

span.span: Returns the average (arithmetic mean) of the arguments.

para.span: 参数可以是数字，也可以是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: Arguments can either be numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 直接键入参数列表的数字的逻辑值和文本表示也包括在内。

span.span: Logical values and text representations of numbers that you type directly into the list of arguments are counted.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但含有零值的单元格包括在内。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: 如果参数为错误值或不能转换为数字的文本，则将导致错误。

span.span: Arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers cause errors.

para.span: 如果要对引用中的逻辑值和数字的文本表示进行计算，请使用 AVERAGEA 函数。

span.span: If you want to include logical values and text representations of numbers in a reference as part of the calculation, use the AVERAGEA function.

para.span: Average方法衡量趋同性，即统计分布中一组数字的中心位置。

span.span: The Average method measures central tendency, which is the location of the center of a group of numbers in a statistical distribution.

para.span: 三种最常见的趋中性衡量方式为：

span.span: The three most common measures of central tendency are:

description.span: 平均值，即算术平均值，计算方法是添加一组数字，然后除以这些数字的计数。

span.span: Average which is the arithmetic mean, and is calculated by adding a group of numbers and then dividing by the count of those numbers.

description.span: 例如，2、3、3、5、7 和 10 的平均值为 30 除以 6，即为 5。

span.span: For example, the average of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 30 divided by 6, which is 5.

description.span: 中值，表示一组数字的中间数;即，一半数字的值大于中值，一半的数字具有小于中值的值。

span.span: Median which is the middle number of a group of numbers; that is, half the numbers have values that are greater than the median, and half the numbers have values that are less than the median.
For example, the median of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 4.

description.span: 模式是一组数字中出现次数最多的模式。

span.span: Mode which is the most frequently occurring number in a group of numbers.
For example, the mode of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 3.

para.span: 对于对称分布的一组数字，这三种趋中性衡量方式完全相同。对于偏态分布的一组数字，这些衡量方式可能会不同。

span.span: For a symmetrical distribution of a group of numbers, these three measures of central tendency are all the same. For a skewed distribution of a group of numbers, they can be different.

para.span: 对单元格求平均值时，请牢记空单元格与包含零值单元格的差，尤其是在已清除"视图"选项卡"选项"命令"工具"菜单上的"零值" (复选框) 。

span.span: When averaging cells, keep in mind the difference between empty cells and those containing the value zero, especially if you have cleared the Zero values check box on the View tab (Options command, Tools menu).

para.span: 空单元格不计算在内，但值为零。

span.span: Empty cells are not counted, but zero values are.

Public Function AverageIf (Arg1 As Range, Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: 要求其平均值的一个或多个单元格。

span.span: One or more cells to average.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: 定义将对哪些单元格求平均值的条件，其形式可以为数字、表达式、单元格引用或文本。

span.span: The criteria in the form of a number, expression, cell reference, or text that defines which cells are averaged.

param.span: 例如，条件可以表示为 32、"32"、"32"、"apples" > 或 B4。

span.span: For example, criteria can be expressed as 32, "32", ">32", "apples", or B4.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: 要求其平均值的实际单元格集合。

span.span: The actual set of cells to average.

param.span: 如果省略，则使用 range。

span.span: If omitted, range is used.

summary.span: 返回区域内满足给定条件的所有单元格的平均值（算术平均值）。

span.span: Returns the average (arithmetic mean) of all the cells in a range that meet a given criteria.

para.span: 区域中包含 true 或 false 的单元格将被忽略。

span.span: Cells in range that contain true or false are ignored.

para.span: 如果 range 或 average_range 单元格为空单元格 ，AverageIf 将忽略它。

span.span: If a cell in range or average_range is an empty cell, AverageIf ignores it.

para.span: 如果条件中的单元格为空 ，AverageIf 将它视为 0 值。

span.span: If a cell in criteria is empty, AverageIf treats it as a 0 value.

para.span: 如果范围中没有任何单元格符合条件，则 AverageIf 将生成一个错误值。

span.span: If no cells in the range meet the criteria, AverageIf generates an error value.

para.span: 可以在条件中使用通配符，包括问号 (?) 和星号 (\*)。问号可匹配任意的单个字符；星号可匹配任意一串字符。如果要查找实际的问号或星号，则请在该字符前键入一个波形符 (~)。

span.span: You can use the wildcard characters, question mark (?) and asterisk (\*), in criteria. A question mark matches any single character; an asterisk matches any sequence of characters. If you want to find an actual question mark or asterisk, type a tilde (~) before the character.

para.span: Average_range 的大小和形状不必与 range 相同。求其平均值的实际单元格的确定方法如下：使用 average_range 中左上角的单元格作为起始单元格，然后将与 range 的大小和形状对应的所有单元格包含到其中。例如：

span.span: Average_range does not have to be the same size and shape as range. The actual cells that are averaged are determined by using the top, left cell in average_range as the beginning cell, and then including cells that correspond in size and shape to range. For example:
A1:A5
B1:B5
B1:B5
A1:A5
B1:B3
B1:B5
A1:B4
C1:D4
C1:D4
A1:B4
C1:C2
C1:D4

para.span: AverageIf方法衡量趋同性，即统计分布中一组数字的中心位置。

span.span: The AverageIf method measures central tendency, which is the location of the center of a group of numbers in a statistical distribution.

para.span: 三种最常见的趋中性衡量方式为：

span.span: The three most common measures of central tendency are:

description.span: 平均值，即算术平均值，计算方法是添加一组数字，然后除以这些数字的计数。

span.span: Average which is the arithmetic mean, and is calculated by adding a group of numbers and then dividing by the count of those numbers.

description.span: 例如，2、3、3、5、7 和 10 的平均值为 30 除以 6，即为 5。

span.span: For example, the average of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 30 divided by 6, which is 5.

description.span: 中值，表示一组数字的中间数;即，一半数字的值大于中值，一半的数字具有小于中值的值。

span.span: Median which is the middle number of a group of numbers; that is, half the numbers have values that are greater than the median, and half the numbers have values that are less than the median.
For example, the median of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 4.

description.span: 模式是一组数字中出现次数最多的模式。

span.span: Mode which is the most frequently occurring number in a group of numbers.
For example, the mode of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 3.

para.span: 对于对称分布的一组数字，这三种趋中性衡量方式完全相同。对于偏态分布的一组数字，这些衡量方式可能会不同。

span.span: For a symmetrical distribution of a group of numbers, these three measures of central tendency are all the same. For a skewed distribution of a group of numbers, they can be different.

span.span: If there are no cells that meet all the criteria, AverageIfs generates an error value.

para.span: 可以在条件中使用通配符，包括问号 (?) 和星号 (\*)。问号可匹配任意的单个字符；星号可匹配任意一串字符。如果要查找实际的问号或星号，则请在该字符前键入一个波形符 (~)。

span.span: You can use the wildcard characters, question mark (?) and asterisk (\*), in criteria. A question mark matches any single character; an asterisk matches any sequence of characters. If you want to find an actual question mark or asterisk, type a tilde (~) before the character.

para.span: 每个 criteria_range 的大小和形状不必与 average_range 相同。计算其平均值的实际单元格的确定方法如下：使用 criteria_range 中左上角的单元格作为起始单元格，然后将与 range 的大小和形状对应的所有单元格包含到其中。例如：

span.span: Each criteria_range does not have to be the same size and shape as average_range. The actual cells that are averaged are determined by using the top, left cell in that criteria_range as the beginning cell, and then including cells that correspond in size and shape to range. For example:
A1:A5
B1:B5
B1:B5
A1:A5
B1:B3
B1:B5
A1:B4
C1:D4
C1:D4
A1:B4
C1:C2
C1:D4

para.span: AverageIfs函数衡量趋同性，即统计分布中一组数字的中心位置。

span.span: The AverageIfs function measures central tendency, which is the location of the center of a group of numbers in a statistical distribution.

para.span: 三种最常见的趋中性衡量方式为：

span.span: The three most common measures of central tendency are:

description.span: 平均值，即算术平均值，计算方法是添加一组数字，然后除以这些数字的计数。

span.span: Average which is the arithmetic mean, and is calculated by adding a group of numbers and then dividing by the count of those numbers.

description.span: 例如，2、3、3、5、7 和 10 的平均值为 30 除以 6，即为 5。

span.span: For example, the average of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 30 divided by 6, which is 5.

description.span: 中值，表示一组数字的中间数;即，一半数字的值大于中值，一半的数字具有小于中值的值。

span.span: Median which is the middle number of a group of numbers; that is, half the numbers have values that are greater than the median, and half the numbers have values that are less than the median.
For example, the median of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 4.

description.span: 模式是一组数字中出现次数最多的模式。

span.span: Mode which is the most frequently occurring number in a group of numbers.
For example, the mode of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 3.

para.span: 对于对称分布的一组数字，这三种趋中性衡量方式完全相同。对于偏态分布的一组数字，这些衡量方式可能会不同。

span.span: For a symmetrical distribution of a group of numbers, these three measures of central tendency are all the same. For a skewed distribution of a group of numbers, they can be different.

param.name: Arg1

param.span: 该分布的 Beta 参数。

param.span: 如果 cumulative 为 true，则BETA。DIST 返回累积分布函数;如果 为 false，则返回概率密度函数。

span.span: If cumulative is true, BETA.DIST returns the cumulative distribution function; if false, it returns the probability density function.

summary.span: 返回 Beta 累积分布函数。

span.span: Returns the beta cumulative distribution function.

para.span: Beta 分布通常用于研究样本中某些事物变化的百分比，例如人们一天中用来看电视的时间所占的比例：

span.span: The beta distribution is commonly used to study variation in the percentage of something across samples, such as the fraction of the day people spend watching television:

description.span: 如果任一参数为非数字，则 Beta_Dist 返回#VALUE！

span.span: If any argument is nonnumeric, Beta_Dist returns the #VALUE!
error value.

description.span: 如果 alpha ≤ 0 或 beta ≤ 0，Beta_Dist 将生成错误值。

span.span: If alpha ≤ 0 or beta ≤ 0, Beta_Dist generates an error value.

description.span: 如果 x < A、x B 或 > A = B，Beta_Dist 将生成错误值。

span.span: If x < A, x > B, or A = B, Beta_Dist generates an error value.

description.span: 如果省略 A 和 B 的值 (上限) ，Beta_Dist使用标准累积 beta分布，以便 A = 0 和 B = 1。

span.span: If you omit values for A and B (lower and upper bound), Beta_Dist uses the standard cumulative beta distribution, so that A = 0 and B = 1.

summary.span: 返回指定的 Beta 分布的累积分布函数的反函数。

span.span: Returns the inverse of the cumulative distribution function for a specified beta distribution.

summary.span: 即，如果 probability = Beta_Dist(x,...)，则 Beta_Inv(probability,...) = x。

span.span: That is, if probability = Beta_Dist(x,...), then Beta_Inv(probability,...) = x.

para.span: 在项目计划中，如果给定预期完成时间和变化率，则可使用 Beta 分布来建立可能完成时间的模型：

span.span: The beta distribution can be used in project planning to model probable completion times given an expected completion time and variability:

description.span: 如果任一参数为非数值 Beta_Inv将生成 一个错误值。

span.span: If any argument is nonnumeric, Beta_Inv generates an error value.

description.span: 如果 alpha ≤ 0 或 beta ≤ 0，Beta_Inv 将生成错误值。

span.span: If alpha ≤ 0 or beta ≤ 0, Beta_Inv generates an error value.

description.span: 如果 probability ≤ 0 或 probability > 1，则 Beta_Inv 生成错误值。

span.span: If probability ≤ 0 or probability > 1, Beta_Inv generates an error value.

description.span: 如果省略了 A 和 B (下限值) ，Beta_Inv使用标准累积 beta分布，以便 A = 0 和 B = 1。

span.span: If you omit values for A and B (lower and upper bound), Beta_Inv uses the standard cumulative beta distribution, so that A = 0 and B = 1.

para.span: 如果给定概率值，Beta_Inv求值 x，Beta_Dist (x、alpha、beta、TRUE、A、B) = probability。

span.span: Given a value for probability, Beta_Inv seeks that value x such that Beta_Dist(x, alpha, beta, TRUE, A, B) = probability.

para.span: 因此 ，Beta_Inv取决于 的精度 。

span.span: Thus, precision of Beta_Inv depends on precision of .

para.span: Beta_Inv 迭代搜索技术。

span.span: Beta_Inv uses an iterative search technique.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Number_s - 试验中成功次数。

span.span: Number_s - the number of successes in trials.

span.span: Cumulative - a logical value that determines the form of the function.

param.span: 如果 cumulative 为 True，则该方法返回累积分布函数，即最多有 number_s 成功的概率;如果 为 False，则返回概率质量函数，即存在成功的概率number_s函数。

span.span: If cumulative is True, then the method returns the cumulative distribution function, which is the probability that there are at most number_s successes; if False, it returns the probability mass function, which is the probability that there are number_s successes.

summary.span: 返回一元二项式分布的概率。

span.span: Returns the individual term binomial distribution probability.

para.span: 当任何试验的结果仅包含成功或失败两种情况，当试验是独立试验，以及当整个试验过程中成功的概率固定不变时，Binom_Dist 方法适用于固定次数的检验或试验。

span.span: Use the Binom_Dist method in problems with a fixed number of tests or trials, when the outcomes of any trial are only success or failure, when trials are independent, and when the probability of success is constant throughout the experiment.

para.span: 例如 ，Binom_Dist方法 可以计算以下三个子项中的两个为男性的概率。

span.span: For example, the Binom_Dist method can calculate the probability that two of the next three babies born are male.

description.span: Number_s 和 trials 将被截尾取整。

span.span: Number_s and trials are truncated to integers.

span.span: If probability_s < 0 or probability_s > 1, the Binom_Dist method generates an error.

public: double Ceiling(double Arg1, double Arg2);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Number - 要舍入的值。

span.span: Number - the value you want to round.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Significance - 用以进行舍入计算的倍数。

span.span: Significance - the multiple to which you want to round.

summary.span: 返回向上舍入（远离零）到最接近的 significance 的倍数的 number。

span.span: Returns number rounded up, away from zero, to the nearest multiple of significance.

para.span: 重要说明：此函数已被替换为一个或多个新函数，这些函数可提供更高的准确性，并且名称可以更好地反映其用法。

span.span: Important: This function has been replaced with one or more new functions that may provide improved accuracy and whose names better reflect their usage.

para.span: 此函数仍可用于与早期版本的 Excel 兼容。

span.span: This function is still available for compatibility with earlier versions of Excel.

para.span: 但是，如果不需要向后兼容性，则应考虑从现在开始使用新函数，因为它们可以更准确地描述其功能。

span.span: However, if backward compatibility is not required, you should consider using the new functions from now on, because they more accurately describe their functionality.

para.span: 有关新函数的信息，请参阅 方法。

span.span: For more information about the new function, see the method.

para.span: 例如，如果要避免在价格中使用“分”，而产品价格为 ￥4.42, 那么可使用公式 Ceiling(4.42,0.05) 将价格进位到最近的“角”。

span.span: For example, if you want to avoid using pennies in your prices and your product is priced at $4.42, use the formula Ceiling(4.42,0.05) to round prices up to the nearest nickel.

para.span: 如果任一参数为非数值，Ceiling 将生成错误。

span.span: If either argument is nonnumeric, Ceiling generates an error.

para.span: 不论 number 的符号如何，向远离零的方向调整时，值都会向上舍入。如果 number 正好是 significance 的倍数，则无需进行任何舍入处理。

span.span: Regardless of the sign of number, a value is rounded up when adjusted away from zero. If number is an exact multiple of significance, no rounding occurs.

para.span: 如果 number 和 significance 的符号不同，则 Ceiling 将生成错误。

span.span: If number and significance have different signs, Ceiling generates an error.

para.span: χ2 分布与 χ2 测试相关联。

span.span: The χ2 distribution is associated with a χ2 test.

para.span: 使用 χ2 测试比较观察到的值和预期值。

span.span: Use the χ2 test to compare observed and expected values.

para.span: 例如，某项遗传学实验可能假设下一代植物将呈现出某一组颜色。通过对观察到的结果和所期望的结果进行比较，可以判定初始假设是否有效。

span.span: For example, a genetic experiment might hypothesize that the next generation of plants will exhibit a certain set of colors. By comparing the observed results with the expected ones, you can decide whether your original hypothesis is valid.

para.span: 如果任一参数为非数字， 则 ChiDist 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If either argument is nonnumeric, ChiDist generates an error.

para.span: 如果 x 为负数 ，则 ChiDist 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If x is negative, ChiDist generates an error.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom 不是整数，则将被截尾取整。

span.span: If degrees_freedom is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom < 1 或 degrees_freedom > 10^10， 则 ChiDist 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If degrees_freedom < 1 or degrees_freedom > 10^10, ChiDist generates an error.

para.span: ChiDist 的计算公式为 ChiDist = P (X > x) ，其中 X 是 χ2 随机变量。

span.span: ChiDist is calculated as ChiDist = P(X>x), where X is a χ2 random variable.

Public Function ChiSq_Test (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object) As Double
public: double ChiSq_Test(System::Object ^ Arg1, System::Object ^ Arg2);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: 包含观察值的数据区域，将根据期望值检验这些观察值。

span.span: The range of data that contains observations to test against expected values.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: 包含行汇总和列汇总的乘积与总计值之比率的数据区域。

span.span: The range of data that contains the ratio of the product of row totals and column totals to the grand total.

summary.span: 返回独立性检验值。

span.span: Returns the test for independence.

para.span: ChiSq_Test 统计值和适当自由度的 χ2 (χ2) 返回值。

span.span: ChiSq_Test returns the value from the chi-squared (χ2) distribution for the statistic and the appropriate degrees of freedom.

para.span: 可以使用 χ2 测试来确定假设结果是否由实验验证。

span.span: You can use χ2 tests to determine whether hypothesized results are verified by an experiment.

para.span: 如果actual_range expected_range数据点数不同，则 ChiSq_Test返回 #N/A 错误值。

span.span: If actual_range and expected_range have a different number of data points, ChiSq_Test returns the #N/A error value.

para.span: χ2 测试首先使用公式计算 χ2 统计信息：

span.span: The χ2 test first calculates a χ2 statistic using the formula:

para.span: 图 1：x 平方测试的公式

span.span: Figure 1: Formula for x squared test

para.span: 其中：

span.span: where:

description.span: Aij = 第 i 行、第 j 列的实际频率

span.span: Aij = actual frequency in the i-th row, j-th column

description.span: Eij = 第 i 行、第 j 列的预期频率

span.span: Eij = expected frequency in the i-th row, j-th column
r = number or rows
c = number of columns

para.span: 低值 χ2 是独立指示器。

span.span: A low value of χ2 is an indicator of independence.

para.span: 从公式中可以看到，χ2 始终为正数或 0，并且仅在 Aχ = Eχ 表示每个 i，j 时为 0。

span.span: As can be seen from the formula, χ2 is always positive or 0, and is 0 only if Aij = Eij for every i,j.

para.span: ChiSq_Test 在假定独立时，χ2 统计值至少与上述公式计算的值一样高的概率。

span.span: ChiSq_Test returns the probability that a value of the χ2 statistic at least as high as the value calculated by the above formula could have happened by chance under the assumption of independence.

para.span: 在计算此概率 时，ChiSq_Test χ2 分布使用适当数量的自由度 df。

span.span: In computing this probability, ChiSq_Test uses the χ2 distribution with an appropriate number of degrees of freedom, df.

para.span: 如果 r > 1 和 c > 1，则 df = (r - 1) (c - 1) 。

span.span: If r > 1 and c > 1, then df = (r - 1)(c - 1).

para.span: 如果 r = 1 和 c > 1，则 df = c - 1，如果 r > 1 和 c = 1，则 df = r - 1。

span.span: If r = 1 and c > 1, then df = c - 1 or if r > 1 and c = 1, then df = r - 1.

para.span: r = c= 1 是不允许的，并生成错误。

span.span: r = c= 1 is not allowed and generates an error.

para.span: 当 Eij ChiSq_Test过小时，最适合使用资源。

span.span: Use of ChiSq_Test is most appropriate when Eij’s are not too small.

para.span: 一些专家建议每个 Eij 应大于或等于 5。

span.span: Some statisticians suggest that each Eij should be greater than or equal to 5.

span.span: The arguments can be numbers, cell references, defined names, formulas, functions, or text.

summary.span: 用作 索引以从值参数列表中返回值。

span.span: Uses as the index to return a value from the list of value arguments.

para.span: 如果 为 1，Choose 将返回 value1;如果为 2，则 Choose将返回 value2;以此类值。

span.span: If is 1, Choose returns value1; if it is 2, Choose returns value2; and so on.

para.span: 如果小于 1 或大于列表中最后一个值的数量 ，Choose 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If is less than 1 or greater than the number of the last value in the list, Choose generates an error.

para.span: 如果 为分数，则使用前将被截短为最低整数。

span.span: If is a fraction, it is truncated to the lowest integer before being used.

para.span: 如果 为数组，则计算 Choose 时将计算每个值。

span.span: If is an array, every value is evaluated when Choose is evaluated.

para.span: Choose 的值参数 可以是 区域引用，也可以为单个值。

span.span: The value arguments to Choose can be range references as well as single values.

para.span: 例如，公式：

span.span: For example, the formula:
=SUM(Choose(2,A1:A10,B1:B10,C1:C10))

para.span: 计算结果为：

span.span: evaluates to:

para.span: =SUM (B1：B10)

span.span: =SUM(B1:B10)

para.span: 然后根据 B1：B10 范围中的值返回值。

span.span: which then returns a value based on the values in the range B1:B10.

para.span: 首先 计算 Choose 函数，返回引用 B1：B10。

span.span: The Choose function is evaluated first, returning the reference B1:B10.

para.span: 然后，使用 Choose 函数的结果 B1：B10 计算 SUM函数作为其参数。

span.span: The SUM function is then evaluated using B1:B10, the result of the Choose function, as its argument.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: 要从中删除非打印字符的任何工作表信息。

span.span: Any worksheet information from which you want to remove nonprintable characters.

summary.span: 删除文本中的所有非打印字符。

span.span: Removes all nonprintable characters from text.

para.span: 对从其他应用程序导入的文本使用 Clean， 其中包含可能无法随操作系统打印的字符。

span.span: Use Clean on text imported from other applications that contains characters that may not print with your operating system.

para.span: 例如，您可以使用 Clean 删除一些低级别计算机代码，这些代码经常位于数据文件的开头和结尾，并且无法打印。

span.span: For example, you can use Clean to remove some low-level computer code that is frequently at the beginning and end of data files and cannot be printed.

para.span: 重要提示 ：Clean 函数旨在删除 7 位 ASCII 代码中的前 32 个非打印字符 (文本中删除值 0) 31。

span.span: Important: The Clean function was designed to remove the first 32 nonprinting characters in the 7-bit ASCII code (values 0 through 31) from text.

para.span: 在 Unicode 字符集中，还有其他非打印字符（值 127、129、141、143、144 和 157）。

span.span: In the Unicode character set, there are additional nonprinting characters (values 127, 129, 141, 143, 144, and 157).

para.span: Clean 函数 本身 不会删除这些额外的非打印字符。

span.span: By itself, the Clean function does not remove these additional nonprinting characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Confidence (double Arg1, double Arg2, double Arg3);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 Confidence([in]float64 Arg1, [in]float64 Arg2, [in]float64 Arg3) runtime managed
Public Function Confidence (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Double, Arg3 As Double) As Double
public: double Confidence(double Arg1, double Arg2, double Arg3);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: 用于计算置信度的显著性水平。置信度等于 100\*(1 - alpha)%，亦即，如果 alpha 为 0.05，则置信度为 95%。

span.span: The significance level used to compute the confidence level. The confidence level equals 100\*(1 - alpha)%, or in other words, an alpha of 0.05 indicates a 95 percent confidence level.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: 数据区域的总体标准偏差，假定为已知。

span.span: The population standard deviation for the data range and is assumed to be known.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: 样本大小。

span.span: The sample size.

summary.span: 返回一个值，可使用该值构造总体平均值的置信区间。

span.span: Returns a value that you can use to construct a confidence interval for a population mean.

para.span: 重要说明：此函数已被替换为一个或多个新函数，这些函数可提供更高的准确性，并且名称可以更好地反映其用法。

span.span: Important: This function has been replaced with one or more new functions that may provide improved accuracy and whose names better reflect their usage.

para.span: 此函数仍可用于与早期版本的 Excel 兼容。

span.span: This function is still available for compatibility with earlier versions of Excel.

para.span: 但是，如果不需要向后兼容性，则应考虑从现在开始使用新函数，因为它们可以更准确地描述其功能。

span.span: However, if backward compatibility is not required, you should consider using the new functions from now on, because they more accurately describe their functionality.

para.span: 有关新函数的信息，请参阅 方法 。

span.span: For more information about the new functions, see the and methods.

para.span: 置信区间为一个值区域。

span.span: The confidence interval is a range of values.

para.span: 样本平均值 x 位于此区域的中心，并且区域为 x ± Confidence。

span.span: Your sample mean, x, is at the center of this range and the range is x ± Confidence.

para.span: 例如，如果 x 是通过邮件订购的产品的传递时间示例平均值，则 x ± Confidence 是总体平均值的范围。

span.span: For example, if x is the sample mean of delivery times for products ordered through the mail, x ± Confidence is a range of population means.

para.span: 对于任何总体平均值 μ0，在此范围内，从 μ0 进一步获取样本平均值的概率大于 alpha;对于任何总体平均值 μ0（不在此范围内），从 μ0 进一步获取大于 x 的样本平均值的概率小于 alpha。

span.span: For any population mean, μ0, in this range, the probability of obtaining a sample mean further from μ0 than x is greater than alpha; for any population mean, μ0, not in this range, the probability of obtaining a sample mean further from μ0 than x is less than alpha.

para.span: 换句话说，假设我们使用 x、standard_dev 和 size 构造一个双尾检验，假设的显著性级别为 alpha，总体平均值为 μ0。

span.span: In other words, assume that we use x, standard_dev, and size to construct a two-tailed test at significance level alpha of the hypothesis that the population mean is μ0.

para.span: 如果 μ0 在置信区间内，我们不会拒绝该假设，如果 μ0 不在置信区间内，我们将拒绝该假设。

span.span: Then we will not reject that hypothesis if μ0 is in the confidence interval and will reject that hypothesis if μ0 is not in the confidence interval.

para.span: 置信区间不允许进行概率为 1 - alpha 的推断，此时下一份包裹的交付时间将肯定位于置信区间内。

span.span: The confidence interval does not allow us to infer that there is probability 1 – alpha that our next package will take a delivery time that is in the confidence interval.

para.span: 如果任一参数为非数字， 则 Confidence 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If any argument is nonnumeric, Confidence generates an error.

para.span: 如果 alpha ≤ 0 或 alpha ≥ 1， 则 Confidence 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If alpha ≤ 0 or alpha ≥ 1, Confidence generates an error.

para.span: 如果 standard_dev ≤ 0， 则 Confidence 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If standard_dev ≤ 0, Confidence generates an error.

para.span: 如果 size 不是整数，则将被截尾取整。

span.span: If size is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果大小 < 为 1， 则 Confidence 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If size < 1, Confidence generates an error.

para.span: 如果假定 alpha 等于 0.05，则需要计算等于 (1 - alpha) 或 95% 的标准正态分布曲线之下的面积。

span.span: If we assume alpha equals 0.05, we need to calculate the area under the standard normal curve that equals (1 - alpha), or 95 percent.

para.span: 此面积值为 ±1.96。

span.span: This value is ± 1.96.

para.span: 因此置信区间为：

span.span: The confidence interval is therefore:

para.span: 图 1：置信区间

span.span: Figure 1: Confidence interval

span.span: For any population mean, μ0, in this range, the probability of obtaining a sample mean further from μ0 than x is greater than alpha; for any population mean, μ0, not in this range, the probability of obtaining a sample mean further from μ0 than x is less than alpha.

para.span: 换句话说，假设使用 x、standard_dev 和大小在假设的显著性级别 alpha 构造双尾检验，总体平均值为 μ0。

para.span: 如果 μ0 在置信区间内，我们不会拒绝该假设，如果 μ0 不在置信区间内，我们将拒绝该假设。

span.span: Then we will not reject that hypothesis if μ0 is in the confidence interval and will reject that hypothesis if μ0 is not in the confidence interval.

para.span: 置信区间不允许推断下一个程序包的传递时间在置信区间内的概率为 1 – alpha。

span.span: The confidence interval does not allow inference that there is probability 1 – alpha that the next package will take a delivery time that is in the confidence interval.

para.span: 如果任一参数为非数字 Confidence_Norm将生成 错误。

span.span: If alpha ≤ 0 or alpha ≥ 1, Confidence_Norm generates an error.

span.span: If size is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果假定 alpha 等于 0.05，则需要计算等于 (1 - alpha) 或 95% 的标准正态分布曲线下的面积。

span.span: If it is assumed that alpha equals 0.05, calculate the area under the standard normal curve that equals (1 - alpha), or 95 percent.

para.span: 此面积值为 ±1.96。

span.span: This value is ± 1.96.

para.span: 因此置信区间为：

para.span: 可以在条件中使用通配符，包括问号 (?) 和星号 (\*)。问号可匹配任意的单个字符；星号可匹配任意一串字符。如果要查找实际的问号或星号，则请在该字符前键入一个波形符 (~)。

span.span: You can use the wildcard characters, question mark (?) and asterisk (\*), for the criteria. A question mark matches any single character; an asterisk matches any sequence of characters. If you want to find an actual question mark or asterisk, type a tilde (~) before the character.

span.span: The type of day count basis to use.

span.span: Returns the number of days from the beginning of the coupon period to the settlement date.

para.span: 下表包含 .

span.span: The following table contains the list of values for .
0 or omitted

description.span: 美国（美国证券交易商协会）30/360

span.span: US (NASD) 30/360
Actual/actual
Actual/360
Actual/365
European 30/360

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 结算日是购买者买入息票（如债券）的日期。到期日是息票有效期截止时的日期。例如，在 2008 年 1 月 1 日发行的 30 年期债券，六个月后被购买者买走。则发行日为 2008 年 1 月 1 日，结算日为 2008 年 7 月 1 日，而到期日是在发行日 2008 年 1 月 1 日的 30 年后，即 2038 年 1 月 1 日。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

para.span: 所有参数都将被截尾取整。

span.span: All arguments are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 settlement 或 maturity 不是有效日期， 则 CoupDayBs 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If settlement or maturity is not a valid date, CoupDayBs generates an error.

para.span: 如果 frequency 是除 1、2 或 4 外的任何数字， 则 CoupDayBs 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If frequency is any number other than 1, 2, or 4, CoupDayBs generates an error.

para.span: 如果 basis < 0 或 basis > 4， 则 CoupDayBs 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If basis < 0 or if basis > 4, CoupDayBs generates an error.

para.span: 如果 settlement ≥ maturity， 则 CoupDayBs 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If settlement ≥ maturity, CoupDayBs generates an error.

para.span: 结算日是购买者买入息票（如债券）的日期。到期日是息票有效期截止时的日期。例如，在 2008 年 1 月 1 日发行的 30 年期债券，六个月后被购买者买走。则发行日为 2008 年 1 月 1 日，结算日为 2008 年 7 月 1 日，而到期日则是在发行日 2008 年 1 月 1 日的 30 年后，即 2038 年 1 月 1 日。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, which is 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

param.name: Arg1

summary.span: 返回协方差，即每对数据点的偏差乘积的平均数。

span.span: Returns covariance, the average of the products of deviations for each data point pair.

para.span: 重要说明：此函数已被替换为一个或多个新函数，这些函数可提供更高的准确性，并且名称可以更好地反映其用法。

span.span: Important: This function has been replaced with one or more new functions that may provide improved accuracy and whose names better reflect their usage.

para.span: 此函数仍可用于与早期版本的 Excel 兼容。

span.span: This function is still available for compatibility with earlier versions of Excel.

para.span: 但是，如果不需要向后兼容性，则应考虑从现在开始使用新函数，因为它们可以更准确地描述其功能。

span.span: However, if backward compatibility is not required, you should consider using the new functions from now on, because they more accurately describe their functionality.

para.span: 有关新函数的信息，请参阅 and 方法。

span.span: For more information about the new functions, see the and method.

para.span: 使用协方差可以确定两个数据集之间的关系。

span.span: Use covariance to determine the relationship between two data sets.

para.span: 例如，可利用它来检验收入与教育程度是否成正比。

span.span: For example, you can examine whether greater income accompanies greater levels of education.

para.span: 参数必须为数字，或者是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: The arguments must either be numbers or be names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但包含零值的单元格将被包括在内。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: 如果 数据点数量不同， 则 Covar 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If and have different numbers of data points, Covar generates an error.

para.span: 如果任 一 项或为空， 则 Covar 将生成一个错误。

span.span: If either or is empty, Covar generates an error.

para.span: 共同变量为：

span.span: The covariance is:

para.span: 图 1：协方差公式

span.span: Figure 1: Equation for covariance

para.span: 其中 x 和 y 是样本平均值 average (array1) average (array2) ，n 是样本大小。

span.span: where x and y are the sample means AVERAGE(array1) and AVERAGE(array2), and n is the sample size.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Array1 - 第一个整数单元格区域。

span.span: Array1 - The first cell range of integers.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Array2 - 整数的第二个单元格区域。

summary.span: 返回样本协方差，即两个数据集中每对数据点的偏差乘积的平均数。

span.span: Returns the sample covariance, the average of the products of deviations for each data point pair in two data sets.

para.span: 参数必须为数字，或者是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: The arguments must either be numbers or be names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但包含零值的单元格将被包括在内。

para.span: 如果 array1 和 array2 具有不同的数据点数，则 Covariance_S返回 #N/A 错误值。

="=Davolio"
=Davolio

para.span: 筛选文本数据时，Excel 不会区分大写字符和小写字符。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies whether to use the U.S. or European method in the calculation.

summary.span: 按一年 360 天的算法（一年 12 个月，每月 30 天）返回两个日期之间的天数，它用于某些会计计算中。

span.span: Returns the number of days between two dates based on a 360-day year (twelve 30-day months), which is used in some accounting calculations.

para.span: 如果会计系统基于 12 个 30 天月，请使用此函数帮助计算付款。下表包含 .

span.span: Use this function to help compute payments if your accounting system is based on twelve 30-day months.The following tables contains the values for .
false or omitted

description.span: 美国 (NASD) 方法。如果起始日期是一个月的 31 号，则会等于同月的 30 号。如果终止日期是一个月的 31 号，且起始日期早于 30 号，则终止日期等于下一个月的 1 号；否则，终止日期会等于同月的 30 号。

span.span: U.S. (NASD) method. If the starting date is the 31st of a month, it becomes equal to the 30th of the same month. If the ending date is the 31st of a month and the starting date is earlier than the 30th of a month, the ending date becomes equal to the 1st of the next month; otherwise the ending date becomes equal to the 30th of the same month.

description.span: 欧洲方法。发生在一个月的 31 号的起始日期和终止日期都将等于同月的 30 号。

span.span: European method. Starting dates and ending dates that occur on the 31st of a month become equal to the 30th of the same month.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

param.name: Arg1

param.span: Salvage - 资产在折旧期末的价值（有时也称为资产残值）。

span.span: Salvage - the value at the end of the depreciation (sometimes called the salvage value of the asset).

param.name: Arg3

span.span: Life - the number of periods over which the asset is being depreciated (sometimes called the useful life of the asset).

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Period - 要为其计算折旧值的周期。

span.span: Period - the period for which you want to calculate the depreciation.

param.span: Period 必须与 life 使用相同的单位。

span.span: Period must use the same units as life.

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Month - 第一年的月份数。

span.span: Month - the number of months in the first year.

param.span: 如果省略，则假定为 12。

span.span: If month is omitted, it is assumed to be 12.

summary.span: 使用固定余额递减法返回指定周期内某项资产的折旧值。

span.span: Returns the depreciation of an asset for a specified period using the fixed-declining balance method.

para.span: 固定余额递减法按固定费率计算折旧值。

span.span: The fixed-declining balance method computes depreciation at a fixed rate.

para.span: DB 使用下面的公式来计算一个周期的折旧值：

span.span: DB uses the following formulas to calculate depreciation for a period:

para.span: (成本 - 上一期间的总折旧)\ * rate

span.span: (cost - total depreciation from prior periods) \* rate

para.span: 其中：

span.span: where:

para.span: rate = 1 - ( (salvage / cost) ^ (1 / life) ) ，四舍五入到三位小数

span.span: rate = 1 - ((salvage / cost) ^ (1 / life)), rounded to three decimal places

para.span: 第一个周期和最后一个周期的折旧属于特例。

span.span: Depreciation for the first and last periods is a special case.

para.span: 对于第一个时间段，DB 使用此公式：

span.span: For the first period, DB uses this formula:

para.span: cost \* rate \* month / 12

span.span: cost \* rate \* month / 12

para.span: 在上一个期间，DB 使用此公式：

span.span: For the last period, DB uses this formula:

para.span: ( (成本 - 上一期间折旧总额)\ * rate\ * (12 -) ) / 12

span.span: ((cost - total depreciation from prior periods) \* rate \* (12 - month)) / 12

span.span: To indicate an equality comparison operator for either text or a value, type the criteria as a string expression in the appropriate cell in the criteria range:

para.span: =''=entry''

span.span: =''=entry''

para.span: 其中条目是您想要查找的文本或值。

span.span: Where entry is the text or value you want to find.

para.span: 例如：

span.span: For example:
="=Davolio"
=Davolio

para.span: 筛选文本数据时，Excel 不会区分大写字符和小写字符。

span.span: When filtering text data, Excel does not distinguish between uppercase and lowercase characters.

para.span: 但是，可使用公式执行区分大小写的搜索。

span.span: However, you can use a formula to perform a case-sensitive search.

public: double DCountA(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Range ^ Arg1, System::Object ^ Arg2, System::Object ^ Arg3);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Database - 构成列表或数据库的单元格区域。数据库是相关数据的列表，其中包含相关信息的行为记录，而包含数据的列为字段。列表的第一行包含每一列的标签。

span.span: Database - the range of cells that makes up the list or database. A database is a list of related data in which rows of related information are records, and columns of data are fields. The first row of the list contains labels for each column.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Field - 指示函数所使用的列。输入使用双引号括起来的列标签，如“使用年数”或“产量”，或者输入代表列表中列位置的数字（不带引号）：1 代表第一列，2 代表第二列，依此类推。

span.span: Field - indicates which column is used in the function. Enter the column label enclosed between double quotation marks, such as "Age" or "Yield," or a number (without quotation marks) that represents the position of the column within the list: 1 for the first column, 2 for the second column, and so on.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Criteria - 包含指定条件的单元格区域。只要参数 criteria 至少包含一个列标签和列标签下方用于为该列指定条件的一个单元格，就可以为它使用任意区域。

span.span: Criteria - the range of cells that contains the conditions that you specify. You can use any range for the criteria argument, as long as it includes at least one column label and at least one cell below the column label in which you specify a condition for the column.

summary.span: 计算列表或数据库的列中符合指定条件的非空单元格的个数。

span.span: Counts the nonblank cells in a column of a list or database that match conditions that you specify.

para.span: 由于在单元格中键入文本或值时等号用来指示一个公式，因此 Microsoft Excel 将计算键入内容；但是，这可能会导致产生意外的筛选结果。

span.span: Because the equal sign is used to indicate a formula when you type text or a value in a cell, Microsoft Excel evaluates what you type; however, this may cause unexpected filter results.

para.span: 若要指示文本或值的等号比较运算符，在条件范围的适当单元格中键入条件作为字符串表达式：

span.span: To indicate an equality comparison operator for either text or a value, type the criteria as a string expression in the appropriate cell in the criteria range:

para.span: =''=entry''

span.span: =''=entry''

para.span: 其中条目是您想要查找的文本或值。

span.span: Where entry is the text or value you want to find.

para.span: 例如：

span.span: For example:
="=Davolio"
=Davolio

para.span: 筛选文本数据时，Excel 不会区分大写字符和小写字符。

span.span: When filtering text data, Excel does not distinguish between uppercase and lowercase characters.

para.span: 但是，可使用公式执行区分大小写的搜索。

span.span: However, you can use a formula to perform a case-sensitive search.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Ddb (double Arg1, double Arg2, double Arg3, double Arg4, object Arg5);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 Ddb([in]float64 Arg1, [in]float64 Arg2, [in]float64 Arg3, [in]float64 Arg4, [in]object Arg5) runtime managed
Public Function Ddb (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Double, Arg3 As Double, Arg4 As Double, Optional Arg5 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Cost - 资产的初始成本。

span.span: Cost - the initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Salvage - 资产在折旧期末的价值（有时也称为资产残值）。

span.span: Salvage - the value at the end of the depreciation (sometimes called the salvage value of the asset).

param.span: 此值可为 0。

span.span: This value can be 0.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Life - 资产进行折旧计算的周期数（有时也称作资产的生命周期）。

span.span: Life - the number of periods over which the asset is being depreciated (sometimes called the useful life of the asset).

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Period - 要为其计算折旧值的周期。

span.span: Period - the period for which you want to calculate the depreciation.

param.span: Period 必须与 life 使用相同的单位。

span.span: Period must use the same units as life.

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Factor - 余额递减速率。

span.span: Factor - the rate at which the balance declines.

param.span: 如果省略 factor，则假定其值为 2（双倍余额递减法）。

span.span: If factor is omitted, it is assumed to be 2 (the double-declining balance method).

summary.span: 使用双倍余额递减法或其他指定方法返回某项资产在指定周期内的折旧值。

span.span: Returns the depreciation of an asset for a specified period using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify.

para.span: 重要提示：所有五个参数都必须是正数。

span.span: Important: All five arguments must be positive numbers.

para.span: 双倍余额递减法加速计算折旧。

span.span: The double-declining balance method computes depreciation at an accelerated rate.

para.span: 折旧额在第一个期间是最高的，随后将逐个期间下降。

span.span: Depreciation is highest in the first period and decreases in successive periods.

para.span: Ddb 使用下面的公式来计算周期的折旧值：

span.span: Ddb uses the following formula to calculate depreciation for a period:

remarks.code: Min( (cost - total depreciation from prior periods) * (factor/life), (cost - salvage - total depreciation from prior periods) )

para.span: 如果不想使用双倍余额递减法，则请改变 factor 的值。

span.span: Change factor if you do not want to use the double-declining balance method.

para.span: 如果要在折旧值大于余额递减计算时切换到直线折旧法，请使用 函数。

span.span: Use the function if you want to switch to the straight-line depreciation method when depreciation is greater than the declining balance calculation.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Dec2Bin (object Arg1, object Arg2);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Dec2Bin([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2) runtime managed
Public Function Dec2Bin (Arg1 As Object, Optional Arg2 As Object) As String

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Number - 要转换的小数整数。

span.span: Number - the decimal integer you want to convert.

param.span: 如果 number 为负数，则忽略有效位置值 ，Dec2Bin 返回一个 10 个字符的 (10 位) 二进制数，其中最重要的位是符号位。

span.span: If number is negative, valid place values are ignored and Dec2Bin returns a 10-character (10-bit) binary number in which the most significant bit is the sign bit.

param.span: 其余 9 位是幅值位。

span.span: The remaining 9 bits are magnitude bits.

param.span: 负数用二的补码表示。

span.span: Negative numbers are represented using two's-complement notation.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Places - 要使用的字符数。

span.span: Places - the number of characters to use.

param.span: 如果省略 places，Dec2Bin 将使用所需的最少字符数。

span.span: If places is omitted, Dec2Bin uses the minimum number of characters necessary.

param.span: 当需要为返回的值填充前导 0（零）时，places 尤其有用。

span.span: Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).

summary.span: 将十进制数转换为二进制数。

span.span: Converts a decimal number to binary.

para.span: 如果 number < -512 或数字 > 511，Dec2Bin 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If number < -512 or if number > 511, Dec2Bin returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 number 为非数字 ，Dec2Bin 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If number is nonnumeric, Dec2Bin returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 Dec2Bin 所需的字符数多于 places 字符数，则返回#NUM！

span.span: If Dec2Bin requires more than places characters, it returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 places 不是整数，则将被截尾取整。

span.span: If places is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果 places 为非数字 ，Dec2Bin 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If places is nonnumeric, Dec2Bin returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 places 为零或负数 ，Dec2Bin 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If places is zero or negative, Dec2Bin returns the #NUM!
error value.

span.span: Settlement - the security's settlement date. The security settlement date is the date after the issue date when the security is traded to the buyer.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Maturity - 债券的到期日。

span.span: Maturity - the security's maturity date.

param.span: 到期日是债券有效期截止时的日期。

span.span: The maturity date is the date when the security expires.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Pr - 面值 ￥100 的债券的现价。

span.span: Pr - the security's price per $100 face value.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Redemption - 面值 ￥100 的债券的赎回值。

span.span: Redemption - the security's redemption value per $100 face value.

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Basis - 要使用的日计数基准类型。

span.span: Basis - the type of day count basis to use.

summary.span: 返回债券的贴现率。

span.span: Returns the discount rate for a security.

para.span: 重要提示：日期应该使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 结算日是购买者买入息票（如债券）的日期。到期日是息票有效期截止时的日期。例如，在 2008 年 1 月 1 日发行的 30 年期债券，六个月后被购买者买走。则发行日为 2008 年 1 月 1 日，结算日为 2008 年 7 月 1 日，而到期日是在发行日 2008 年 1 月 1 日的 30 年后，即 2038 年 1 月 1 日。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

para.span: Settlement、maturity 和 basis 将被截尾取整。

span.span: Settlement, maturity, and basis are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 settlement 或 maturity 不是有效的序列号 ，Disc 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If settlement or maturity is not a valid serial date number, Disc returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 pr ≤ 0 或 redemption ≤ 0，Disc 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If pr ≤ 0 or if redemption ≤ 0, Disc returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 basis < 0 或 basis > 4，Disc 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If basis < 0 or if basis > 4, Disc returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 settlement ≥ maturity，Disc 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If settlement ≥ maturity, Disc returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 光盘 的计算公式如下：

span.span: Disc is calculated as follows:

para.span: 图 1：用于计算 Disc 方法的公式

span.span: Figure 1: Equation for calculating Disc method

span.span: where:

para.span: B = 一年中的天数，具体取决于年份。

span.span: B = number of days in a year, depending on the year basis.

para.span: DSM = 结算日与到期日之间的天数。

span.span: DSM = number of days between settlement and maturity.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Database - 构成列表或数据库的单元格区域。数据库是相关数据的列表，其中包含相关信息的行为记录，而包含数据的列为字段。列表的第一行包含每一列的标签。

span.span: Database - the range of cells that makes up the list or database. A database is a list of related data in which rows of related information are records, and columns of data are fields. The first row of the list contains labels for each column.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Field - 指示函数所使用的列。输入使用双引号括起来的列标签，如“使用年数”或“产量”，或者输入代表列表中列位置的数字（不带引号）：1 代表第一列，2 代表第二列，依此类推。

span.span: Field - indicates which column is used in the function. Enter the column label enclosed between double quotation marks, such as "Age" or "Yield," or a number (without quotation marks) that represents the position of the column within the list: 1 for the first column, 2 for the second column, and so on.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Criteria - 包含指定条件的单元格区域。只要参数 criteria 至少包含一个列标签和列标签下方用于为该列指定条件的一个单元格，就可以为它使用任意区域。

span.span: Criteria - the range of cells that contains the conditions that you specify. You can use any range for the criteria argument, as long as it includes at least one column label and at least one cell below the column label in which you specify a condition for the column.

summary.span: 返回列表或数据库的列中符合指定条件的最大数字。

span.span: Returns the largest number in a column of a list or database that matches conditions you that specify.

para.span: 由于在单元格中键入文本或值时等号用来指示一个公式，因此 Microsoft Excel 将计算键入内容；但是，这可能会导致产生意外的筛选结果。

span.span: Because the equal sign is used to indicate a formula when you type text or a value in a cell, Microsoft Excel evaluates what you type; however, this may cause unexpected filter results.

para.span: 若要指示文本或值的等号比较运算符，在条件范围的适当单元格中键入条件作为字符串表达式：

span.span: To indicate an equality comparison operator for either text or a value, type the criteria as a string expression in the appropriate cell in the criteria range:

para.span: =''=entry''

span.span: =''=entry''

para.span: 其中条目是您想要查找的文本或值。

span.span: Where entry is the text or value you want to find.

para.span: 例如：

span.span: For example:
="=Davolio"
=Davolio

para.span: 筛选文本数据时，Excel 不会区分大写字符和小写字符。

span.span: When filtering text data, Excel does not distinguish between uppercase and lowercase characters.

para.span: 但是，可使用公式执行区分大小写的搜索。

span.span: However, you can use a formula to perform a case-sensitive search.

Public Function Dollar (Arg1 As Double, Optional Arg2 As Object) As String

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Number - 数字、对包含数字的单元格的引用或计算结果为数字的公式。

span.span: Number - a number, a reference to a cell containing a number, or a formula that evaluates to a number.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Decimals - 小数点右边的位数。如果 decimals 为负数，则 number 向小数点的左边舍入。如果省略 decimals，则假定其值为 2。

span.span: Decimals - the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. If decimals is negative, number is rounded to the left of the decimal point. If you omit decimals, it is assumed to be 2.

summary.span: 本“帮助”主题中描述的函数可将数字转换为文本格式，并应用货币符号。函数的名称及其应用的货币符号取决于您的语言设置。

span.span: The function described in this Help topic converts a number to text format and applies a currency symbol. The name of the function (and the symbol that it applies) depends upon your language settings.

para.span: 使用"单元格格式"菜单 (设置包含数字的单元格的格式) 与直接使用 Dollar 函数设置数字格式之间的主要区别在于 ，Dollar 将其结果转换为文本。

span.span: The major difference between formatting a cell that contains a number with the Cells command (Format menu) and formatting a number directly with the Dollar function is that Dollar converts its result to text.

para.span: 使用 Cells 命令设置格式的号码仍然是一个数字。

span.span: A number formatted with the Cells command is still a number.

para.span: 可以在公式中继续使用格式为 Dollar 的数字，因为 Microsoft Excel 在计算时会将作为文本值输入的数字转换为数字。

span.span: You can continue to use numbers formatted with Dollar in formulas, because Microsoft Excel converts numbers entered as text values to numbers when it calculates.

span.span: To indicate an equality comparison operator for either text or a value, type the criteria as a string expression in the appropriate cell in the criteria range:

para.span: =''=entry''

span.span: =''=entry''

para.span: 其中条目是您想要查找的文本或值。

span.span: Where entry is the text or value you want to find.

para.span: 例如：

span.span: For example:
="=Davolio"
=Davolio

para.span: 筛选文本数据时，Excel 不会区分大写字符和小写字符。

span.span: When filtering text data, Excel does not distinguish between uppercase and lowercase characters.

para.span: 但是，可使用公式执行区分大小写的搜索。

Public Function Duration (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Arg3 As Object, Arg4 As Object, Arg5 As Object, Optional Arg6 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Settlement - 债券的结算日。债券的结算日是在发行日之后债券卖给购买者的日期。

span.span: Settlement - the security's settlement date. The security settlement date is the date after the issue date when the security is traded to the buyer.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Maturity - 债券的到期日。

span.span: Maturity - the security's maturity date.

param.span: 到期日是债券有效期截止时的日期。

span.span: The maturity date is the date when the security expires.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Coupon - 债券的年息票利率。

span.span: Coupon - the security's annual coupon rate.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Yld - 债券的年收益。

span.span: Yld - the security's annual yield.

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Frequency - 每年支付息票的次数。

span.span: Frequency - the number of coupon payments per year.

param.span: 如果按年支付，frequency = 1；如果按半年期支付，frequency = 2；如果按季支付，frequency = 4。

span.span: For annual payments, frequency = 1; for semiannual, frequency = 2; for quarterly, frequency = 4.

param.name: Arg6
param.span: Basis - 要使用的日计数基准类型。

span.span: Basis - the type of day count basis to use.

summary.span: 返回假设面值 ￥100 的定期付息有价证券的修正期限。期限定义为一系列现金流现值的加权平均值，用于计量债券价格对于收益率变化的敏感程度。

span.span: Returns the Macauley duration for an assumed par value of $100. Duration is defined as the weighted average of the present value of the cash flows and is used as a measure of a bond price's response to changes in yield.

para.span: 重要提示：日期应该使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.
0 or omitted

description.span: 美国（美国证券交易商协会）30/360

span.span: US (NASD) 30/360
Actual/actual
Actual/360
Actual/365
European 30/360

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 结算日是购买者买入息票（如债券）的日期。到期日是息票有效期截止时的日期。例如，在 2008 年 1 月 1 日发行的 30 年期债券，六个月后被购买者买走。则发行日为 2008 年 1 月 1 日，结算日为 2008 年 7 月 1 日，而到期日则是在发行日 2008 年 1 月 1 日的 30 年后，即 2038 年 1 月 1 日。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, which is 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

para.span: Settlement、maturity、frequency 和 basis 将被截尾取整。

span.span: Settlement, maturity, frequency, and basis are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 settlement 或 maturity 不是有效日期 ，Duration 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If settlement or maturity is not a valid date, Duration returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果息 < 票 0 或 yld < 0，Duration 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If coupon < 0 or if yld < 0, Duration returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 frequency 是除 1、2 或 4 外的任何数字 ，Duration 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If frequency is any number other than 1, 2, or 4, Duration returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 basis < 0 或 basis > 4，Duration 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If basis < 0 or if basis > 4, Duration returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 settlement ≥ maturity，Duration 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If settlement ≥ maturity, Duration returns the #NUM!
error value.

MemberSignature.Value: public double EDate (object Arg1, object Arg2);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 EDate([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2) runtime managed
Public Function EDate (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object) As Double
public: double EDate(System::Object ^ Arg1, System::Object ^ Arg2);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Start_date - 代表开始日期的日期。日期应使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。例如，使用 DATE(2008,5,23) 输入 2008 年 5 月 23 日。如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Start_date - a date that represents the start date. Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions. For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008. Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Months - start_date 之前或之后的月数。months 为正值将产生未来日期，为负值将产生过去日期。

span.span: Months - the number of months before or after start_date. A positive value for months yields a future date; a negative value yields a past date.

summary.span: 返回表示某个数据的序列号，该数据代表指定日期 (start_date) 之前或之后的月份数。使用函数 EDATE 可以计算与发行日处于一月中同一天的到期日的日期。

span.span: Returns the serial number that represents the date that is the indicated number of months before or after a specified date (the start_date). Use EDATE to calculate maturity dates or due dates that fall on the same day of the month as the date of issue.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 如果start_date日期无效 ，EDate 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If start_date is not a valid date, EDate returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 months 不是整数，则将被截尾取整。

span.span: If months is not an integer, it is truncated.

span.span: Start_date - a date that represents the starting date. Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions. For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008. Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

summary.span: 返回 start_date 的指定月数之前或之后的月份的最后一天的序列号。用函数 EOMONTH 可计算正好在特定月份中最后一天内的到期日或发行日。

span.span: Returns the serial number for the last day of the month that is the indicated number of months before or after start_date. Use EOMONTH to calculate maturity dates or due dates that fall on the last day of the month.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 如果start_date日期无效， 则 EoMonth 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If start_date is not a valid date, EoMonth returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果start_date月产生无效日期， 则 EoMonth 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If start_date plus months yields an invalid date, EoMonth returns the #NUM!
error value.

summary.span: 返回向上舍入到最接近的偶数的数字。可以使用此函数处理成对出现的项目。例如，一个包装箱一行可容纳一宗或两宗货物。只有当这些货物的数目向上舍入到最接近的偶数，与包装箱的容量相匹配时，包装箱才会装满。

span.span: Returns number rounded up to the nearest even integer. You can use this function for processing items that come in twos. For example, a packing crate accepts rows of one or two items. The crate is full when the number of items, rounded up to the nearest two, matches the crate's capacity.

para.span: 如果 number 为非数字 ，Even 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If number is nonnumeric, Even returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 不论 number 的符号如何，向远离零的方向调整时，值都会向上舍入。如果 number 是偶数，则不会进行任何舍入处理。

span.span: Regardless of the sign of number, a value is rounded up when adjusted away from zero. If number is an even integer, no rounding occurs.

span.span: Returns the exponential distribution. Use EXPON_DIST to model the time between events, such as how long an automated bank teller takes to deliver cash. For example, you can use EXPON_DIST to determine the probability that the process takes at most 1 minute.

summary.span: 返回右尾 F 概率分布。可以使用此函数确定两个数据集是否存在变化程度上的不同。例如，可以分析进入高校的男生、女生的考试分数，确定女生分数的变化程度是否与男生不同。

span.span: Returns the right-tailed F probability distribution. You can use this function to determine whether two data sets have different degrees of diversity. For example, you can examine the test scores of men and women entering high school and determine if the variability in the females is different from that found in the males.

error value.

span.span: If degrees_freedom1 or degrees_freedom2 is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom1 < 1 或 degrees_freedom1 ≥ 10^10，F_Dist_RT返回#NUM！

span.span: If degrees_freedom1 < 1 or degrees_freedom1 ≥ 10^10, F_Dist_RT returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom2 < 1 或 degrees_freedom2 ≥ 10^10，F_Dist_RT返回#NUM！

span.span: If degrees_freedom2 < 1 or degrees_freedom2 ≥ 10^10, F_Dist_RT returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: F_Dist_RT计算结果为 F_DIST_RT=P ( F x ) ，其中 F 是一个随机变量，其 F 分布具有 degrees_freedom1 和 degrees_freedom2 度。 >

span.span: F_Dist_RT is calculated as F_DIST_RT=P( F>x ), where F is a random variable that has an F distribution with degrees_freedom1 and degrees_freedom2 degrees of freedom.

summary.span: 如果 p = F_DIST_RT(x,...)，则 F_INV_RT(p,...) = x。

span.span: If p = F_DIST_RT(x,...), then F_INV_RT(p,...) = x.

para.span: 在 F 检验中，可以使用 F 分布比较两个数据集的变化程度。例如，可以分析美国、加拿大的收入分布，判断这两个国家的收入变化程度是否相似。

span.span: The F distribution can be used in an F-test that compares the degree of variability in two data sets. For example, you can analyze income distributions in the United States and Canada to determine whether the two countries have a similar degree of income diversity.

para.span: 如果任一参数为非数字，则 F_Inv_RT 返回#VALUE！

error value.

error value.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom1 或 degrees_freedom2 不是整数，则将被截尾取整。

span.span: If degrees_freedom1 or degrees_freedom2 is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom1 < 1 或 degrees_freedom1 ≥ 10^10，F_Inv_RT返回#NUM！

span.span: If degrees_freedom1 < 1 or degrees_freedom1 ≥ 10^10, F_Inv_RT returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom2 < 1 或 degrees_freedom2 ≥ 10^10，F_Inv_RT返回#NUM！

span.span: If degrees_freedom2 < 1 or degrees_freedom2 ≥ 10^10, F_Inv_RT returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: F_Inv_RT 可用于从 F 分布返回临界值。

span.span: F_Inv_RT can be used to return critical values from the F distribution.

para.span: 例如，ANOVA 计算的结果通常包含 F 统计值、F 概率和显著水平为 0.05 的 F 临界值等数据。

span.span: For example, the output of an ANOVA calculation often includes data for the F statistic, F probability, and F critical value at the 0.05 significance level.

para.span: 若要返回 F 的临界值，请使用显著性级别作为概率参数F_Inv_RT。

span.span: To return the critical value of F, use the significance level as the probability argument to F_Inv_RT.

para.span: 给定概率值 后，F_Inv_RT 求值 x，F_DIST_RT (x、degrees_freedom1、degrees_freedom2) = probability。

summary.span: 返回 F 检验的结果。F 检验返回的是当 array1 和 array2 的方差无明显不同时的双尾概率。可以使用此函数来确定两个样本的方差是否不同。例如，给定公立和私立学校的测试成绩，可以检验各学校间测试成绩的差别程度。

span.span: Returns the result of an F-test. An F-test returns the two-tailed probability that the variances in array1 and array2 are not significantly different. Use this function to determine whether two samples have different variances. For example, given test scores from public and private schools, you can test whether these schools have different levels of test score diversity.

span.span: and FindB locate one text string within a second text string, and return the number of the starting position of the first text string from the first character of the second text string.

para.span: 重要提示：适用于使用单字节字符集 (SBCS) 的语言，而 FindB 用于使用双字节字符集 (DBCS ) 的语言。

span.span: Important: is intended for use with languages that use the single-byte character set (SBCS), whereas FindB is intended for use with languages that use the double-byte character set (DBCS).

para.span: 计算机上的默认语言设置会以下列方式影响返回值：

span.span: The default language setting on your computer affects the return value in the following way:

description.span: 无论默认语言设置是什么，始终将每个字符（无论是单字节还是双字节）计为 1。

span.span: always counts each character, whether single-byte or double-byte, as 1, no matter what the default language setting is.

description.span: 当启用对支持 DBCS 的语言的编辑，然后将它设置为默认语言时 ，FindB将每个双字节字符计为 2。

span.span: FindB counts each double-byte character as 2 when you have enabled the editing of a language that supports DBCS and then set it as the default language.

description.span: 否则 ，FindB 将每个字符计算为 1。

span.span: Otherwise, FindB counts each character as 1.

para.span: 支持 DBCS 的语言包括日语、中文（简体）、中文（繁体）和朝鲜语。

span.span: The languages that support DBCS include Japanese, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), and Korean.

para.span: 和 FindB区分大小写，不允许使用通配符。

span.span: and FindB are case sensitive and don't allow wildcard characters.

para.span: 如果不想执行区分大小写的搜索或使用通配符，可以使用 和 。

span.span: If you don't want to do a case sensitive search or use wildcard characters, you can use and .

para.span: 如果find_text为"" (文本) ，则匹配搜索字符串 (的第一个字符，即按 start_num 或 1) 。

span.span: If find_text is "" (empty text), matches the first character in the search string (that is, the character numbered start_num or 1).

para.span: Find_text 不能包含任何通配符。

span.span: Find_text cannot contain any wildcard characters.

para.span: 如果find_text未显示在 within_text，FindB 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If find_text does not appear in within_text, and FindB return the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果start_num不大于零 ，FindB 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If start_num is not greater than zero, and FindB return the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果start_num大于该 within_text，FindB 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If start_num is greater than the length of within_text, and FindB return the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 使用 start_num 可跳过指定编号的字符。

span.span: Use start_num to skip a specified number of characters.

para.span: 以 示例为例，假设您使用的是文本字符串"AYF0093"。YoungMensApparel"。

span.span: Using as an example, suppose you are working with the text string "AYF0093.YoungMensApparel".

para.span: 要在文本字符串的说明部分中查找第一个“Y”的编号，请将 start_num 设置为等于 8，这样就不会搜索文本的序列号部分。

span.span: To find the number of the first "Y" in the descriptive part of the text string, set start_num equal to 8 so that the serial-number portion of the text is not searched.

para.span: 以字符 8 开头，find_text下一个字符找到该字符，并返回数字 9。

span.span: begins with character 8, finds find_text at the next character, and returns the number 9.

para.span: 始终返回从开始开始within_text的字符数，如果 start_num大于 1，则计算跳过的字符数。

span.span: always returns the number of characters from the start of within_text, counting the characters you skip if start_num is greater than 1.

summary.span: 根据已有的数值计算或预测未来值。此预测值为基于给定的 x 值推导出的 y 值。已知的数值为已有的 x 值和 y 值，再利用线性回归对新值进行预测。可以使用该函数对未来销售额、库存需求或消费趋势进行预测。

span.span: Calculates, or predicts, a future value by using existing values. The predicted value is a y-value for a given x-value. The known values are existing x-values and y-values, and the new value is predicted by using linear regression. You can use this function to predict future sales, inventory requirements, or consumer trends.

error value.

param.name: Arg1

span.span: Data_array - an array of or reference to a set of values for which you want to count frequencies.

param.span: 如果data_array值 ，Frequency 将返回一个零数组。

span.span: If data_array contains no values, Frequency returns an array of zeros.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Bins_array - 一个区间数组或对区间的引用，该区间用于对 data_array 中的值进行分组。

span.span: Bins_array - an array of or reference to intervals into which you want to group the values in data_array.

param.span: 如果bins_array不包含任何值， 则 Frequency 将返回 data_array。

span.span: If bins_array contains no values, Frequency returns the number of elements in data_array.

summary.span: 计算数值在某个区域内的出现频率，然后返回一个垂直数组。

span.span: Calculates how often values occur within a range of values, and then returns a vertical array of numbers.

summary.span: 例如，使用 Frequency 计算分数范围内测试分数的数量。

span.span: For example, use Frequency to count the number of test scores that fall within ranges of scores.

summary.span: 由于 Frequency 返回数组，因此必须以数组公式输入。

span.span: Because Frequency returns an array, it must be entered as an array formula.

para.span: 在 选择要将返回的分布显示到的相邻单元格区域之后，频率作为数组公式输入。

span.span: Frequency is entered as an array formula after you select a range of adjacent cells into which you want the returned distribution to appear.

para.span: 返回的数组中的元素个数比 bins_array 中的元素个数多 1 个。

span.span: The number of elements in the returned array is one more than the number of elements in bins_array.

para.span: 返回的数组中多出来的元素返回最高区间之上值的个数。

span.span: The extra element in the returned array returns the count of any values above the highest interval.

para.span: 例如，在按三个单元格 (三个值范围) ，请确保在四个单元格中输入 Frequency 作为结果。

span.span: For example, when counting three ranges of values (intervals) that are entered into three cells, be sure to enter Frequency into four cells for the results.

para.span: 多出来的单元格将返回 data_array 中大于第三个区间值的值的个数。

span.span: The extra cell returns the number of values in data_array that are greater than the third interval value.

para.span: Frequency 将忽略空白单元格和文本。

span.span: Frequency ignores blank cells and text.

para.span: 对于返回结果为数组的公式，必须以数组公式的形式输入。

span.span: Formulas that return arrays must be entered as array formulas.

public: double FTest(System::Object ^ Arg1, System::Object ^ Arg2);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: array1 - 第一个数据数组或数据区域。

span.span: Array1 - the first array or range of data.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: array2 - 第二个数据数组或数据区域。

span.span: Array2 - the second array or range of data.

summary.span: 返回 F 检验的结果。F 检验返回的是当 array1 和 array2 的方差无明显不同时的双尾概率。可以使用此函数来确定两个样本的方差是否不同。例如，给定公立和私立学校的测试成绩，可以检验各学校间测试成绩的差别程度。

span.span: Returns the result of an F-test. An F-test returns the two-tailed probability that the variances in array1 and array2 are not significantly different. Use this function to determine whether two samples have different variances. For example, given test scores from public and private schools, you can test whether these schools have different levels of test score diversity.

para.span: 重要说明：此函数已被替换为一个或多个新函数，这些函数可提供更高的准确性，并且名称可以更好地反映其用法。

span.span: Important: This function has been replaced with one or more new functions that may provide improved accuracy and whose names better reflect their usage.

para.span: 此函数仍可用于与早期版本的 Excel 兼容。

span.span: This function is still available for compatibility with earlier versions of Excel.

para.span: 但是，如果不需要向后兼容性，则应考虑从现在开始使用新函数，因为它们可以更准确地描述其功能。

span.span: However, if backward compatibility is not required, you should consider using the new functions from now on, because they more accurately describe their functionality.

para.span: 有关新函数的信息，请参阅 方法。

span.span: For more information about the new function, see the method.

para.span: 参数必须是数字，或是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: The arguments must be either numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但含有零值的单元格包括在内。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: 如果 array1 或 array2 中的数据点数小于 2，或者 array1 或 array2 的方差为零， 则 FTest 将返回 #DIV/0！

span.span: If the number of data points in array1 or array2 is less than 2, or if the variance of array1 or array2 is zero, FTest returns the #DIV/0!
error value.

span.span: Rate - the interest rate per period.
