param.name: Arg1
param.span: Values - 一个数组或对包含数字的单元格的引用。这些数值代表固定期间的一系列支出（负值）及收入（正值）。

span.span: Values - an array or a reference to cells that contain numbers. These numbers represent a series of payments (negative values) and income (positive values) occurring at regular periods.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Finance_rate - 现金流中使用的资金支付的利率。

span.span: Finance_rate - the interest rate you pay on the money used in the cash flows.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Reinvest_rate - 将现金流再投资的收益率。

span.span: Reinvest_rate - the interest rate you receive on the cash flows as you reinvest them.

summary.span: 返回某一连续期间内现金流的修正内部收益率。函数 MIRR 同时考虑了投资的成本和现金再投资的收益率。

span.span: Returns the modified internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows. MIRR considers both the cost of the investment and the interest received on reinvestment of cash.

para.span: 值必须包含至少一个正值和一个负值，以计算修改的内部返回率。

span.span: Values must contain at least one positive value and one negative value to calculate the modified internal rate of return.

para.span: 否则 ，MIrr 将返回 #DIV/0！

span.span: Otherwise, MIrr returns the #DIV/0!
error value.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但含有零值的单元格包括在内。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: MIrr 使用值的顺序来解释现金流的顺序。

span.span: MIrr uses the order of values to interpret the order of cash flows.

para.span: 所以，务必按照实际的顺序输入支出和收入数额，并使用正确的正负号（现金流入用正值，现金流出用负值）。

span.span: Be sure to enter your payment and income values in the sequence you want and with the correct signs (positive values for cash received, negative values for cash paid).

para.span: 如果 n 是值中的现金流数，则 frate 为 finance_rate，rrate reinvest_rate， 则 MIrr 的公式为：

span.span: If n is the number of cash flows in values, frate is the finance_rate, and rrate is the reinvest_rate, then the formula for MIrr is:

para.span: 图 1：MIrr 方法的公式

para.span: 两个数组 b 和 c 的矩阵产品数组为：

span.span: The matrix product array a of two arrays b and c is:

span.span: Formulas that return arrays must be entered as array formulas.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: number1, number2, ... - 要计算其众数的 1 到 30 个参数。也可以不使用这种用逗号分隔参数的形式，而使用一个数组或一个对数组的引用。

span.span: Number1, number2, ... - 1 to 30 arguments for which you want to calculate the mode. You can also use a single array or a reference to an array instead of arguments separated by commas.

summary.span: 返回在某一数组或数据区域中出现频率最多的数值。

span.span: Returns the most frequently occurring, or repetitive, value in an array or range of data.

para.span: 此函数已替换为一个或多个新函数，这些函数可提供更高的准确性，并且名称可以更好地反映其用法。

span.span: This function has been replaced with one or more new functions that may provide improved accuracy and whose names better reflect their usage.

para.span: 此函数仍可用于与早期版本的 Excel 兼容。

span.span: This function is still available for compatibility with earlier versions of Excel.

para.span: 但是，如果不需要向后兼容性，则应考虑从现在开始使用新函数，因为它们可以更准确地描述其功能。

span.span: However, if backward compatibility is not required, you should consider using the new functions from now on, because they more accurately describe their functionality.

para.span: 有关新函数的信息，请参阅 方法 。

span.span: For more information about the new functions, see the and methods.

para.span: 参数可以是数字，也可以是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: Arguments can either be numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但包含零值的单元格将被包括在内。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: 如果参数为错误值或不能转换为数字的文本，则将导致错误。

span.span: Arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers cause errors.

para.span: 如果数据集不包含重复数据点 ，Mode 将返回#N/A 错误值。

span.span: If the data set contains no duplicate data points, Mode returns the #N/A error value.

para.span: 注意：Mode函数衡量趋同性，即统计分布中一组数字的中心位置。

span.span: Note: The Mode function measures central tendency, which is the location of the center of a group of numbers in a statistical distribution.

para.span: 三种最常见的趋中性衡量方式为：

span.span: The three most common measures of central tendency are:

description.span: 平均值，即算术平均值，计算方法是添加一组数字，然后除以这些数字的计数。

span.span: Average which is the arithmetic mean, and is calculated by adding a group of numbers and then dividing by the count of those numbers.

description.span: 例如，2、3、3、5、7 和 10 的平均值为 30 除以 6，即为 5。

span.span: For example, the average of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 30 divided by 6, which is 5.

description.span: 中值，表示一组数字的中间数;即，一半数字的值大于中值，一半的数字具有小于中值的值。

span.span: Median which is the middle number of a group of numbers; that is, half the numbers have values that are greater than the median, and half the numbers have values that are less than the median.
For example, the median of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 4.

description.span: 模式是一组数字中出现次数最多的模式。

span.span: Mode which is the most frequently occurring number in a group of numbers.
For example, the mode of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 3.

para.span: 对于对称分布的一组数字，这三种趋中性衡量方式完全相同。对于偏态分布的一组数字，这些衡量方式可能会不同。

span.span: For a symmetrical distribution of a group of numbers, these three measures of central tendency are all the same. For a skewed distribution of a group of numbers, they can be different.

para.span: 三种最常见的趋中性衡量方式为：

span.span: The three most common measures of central tendency are:

description.span: 平均值 算术平均值，计算方法是添加一组数字，然后除以这些数字的计数。

span.span: Average The arithmetic mean, and is calculated by adding a group of numbers and then dividing by the count of those numbers.

description.span: 例如，2、3、3、5、7 和 10 的平均值为 30 除以 6，即为 5。

span.span: For example, the average of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 30 divided by 6, which is 5.

description.span: 中值：一组数字的中间数;即，一半数字的值大于中值，一半的数字具有小于中值的值。

span.span: Median The middle number of a group of numbers; that is, half the numbers have values that are greater than the median, and half the numbers have values that are less than the median.
For example, the median of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 4.

description.span: 模式 一组数字中出现次数最多的数字。

span.span: Mode The most frequently occurring number in a group of numbers.
For example, the mode of 2, 3, 3, 5, 7, and 10 is 3.

para.span: 对于对称分布的一组数字，这三种趋中性衡量方式完全相同。对于偏态分布的一组数字，这些衡量方式可能会不同。

span.span: For a symmetrical distribution of a group of numbers, these three measures of central tendency are all the same. For a skewed distribution of a group of numbers, they can be different.

error value.

Public Function NetworkDays (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Start_date - 代表开始日期的日期。

span.span: Start_date - a date that represents the start date.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: End_date - 代表结束日期的日期。

span.span: End_date - a date that represents the end date.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Holidays - 可选的区域，包含要从工作日历中排除的一个或多个日期，如各种省/市/自治区和国家/地区的法定假日和非法定假日。该列表可以是包含日期的单元格区域，也可以是由代表日期的序列号所构成的数组常量。

span.span: Holidays - an optional range of one or more dates to exclude from the working calendar, such as state and federal holidays and floating holidays. The list can be either a range of cells that contains the dates or an array constant of the serial numbers that represent the dates.

summary.span: 返回参数 start-data 和 end-data 之间的全部工作日数值。

span.span: Returns the number of whole working days between start_date and end_date.

summary.span: 工作日不包括周末和节假日。

span.span: Working days exclude weekends and any dates identified in holidays.

summary.span: 使用 NetworkDays 根据特定期限内的工作天数计算累积的员工福利。

span.span: Use NetworkDays to calculate employee benefits that accrue based on the number of days worked during a specific term.

para.span: 重要提示：日期应该使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 如果任一参数不是有效日期 ，NetworkDays 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If any argument is not a valid date, NetworkDays returns the #VALUE!
error value.

span.span: The start_date can be earlier than, the same as, or later than the end_date.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: End_date - 要计算其差异的结束日期。

param.name: Arg4

param.span: holidays 中的日期或序列值可按任意顺序排列。

span.span: The ordering of dates or serial values in holidays can be arbitrary.

summary.span: 返回两个日期之间全天工作日的数量，并使用参数指示哪些日期为周末以及周末的天数。周末以及指定为节假日的任何日期都不被视为工作日。

span.span: Returns the number of whole workdays between two dates using parameters to indicate which and how many days are weekend days. Weekend days and any days that are specified as holidays are not considered as workdays.

para.span: 如果 start_date 晚于 end_date，则返回值将为负值，量值将是全天工作日的数量。

span.span: If start_date is later than end_date, the return value will be negative, and the magnitude will be the number of whole workdays.

para.span: 如果 weekend 字符串的长度无效或包含无效 字符，则 NetworkDays_Intl返回#VALUE！

span.span: If a weekend string is of invalid length or contains invalid characters, NetworkDays_Intl returns the #VALUE!
error value.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Rate - 各期利率。

span.span: Rate - the interest rate per period.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Pmt - 各期所应支付的金额，其数值在整个年金期间保持不变。通常，pmt 包括本金和利息，但不包括其他的费用或税款。

span.span: Pmt - the payment made each period; it cannot change over the life of the annuity. Typically, pmt contains principal and interest but no other fees or taxes.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Pv - 现值，或一系列未来付款当前所值的累积和。

span.span: Pv - the present value, or the lump-sum amount that a series of future payments is worth right now.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Fv - 未来值，或在最后一次付款后希望得到的现金余额。如果省略 fv，则假定其值为 0（例如，一笔贷款的未来值为 0）。

span.span: Fv - the future value, or a cash balance you want to attain after the last payment is made. If fv is omitted, it is assumed to be 0 (the future value of a loan, for example, is 0).

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Type - 数字 0 或 1，用以指示付款时间。

span.span: Type - the number 0 or 1 and indicates when payments are due.

summary.span: 基于固定利率及等额分期付款方式，返回某项投资的总期数。

span.span: Returns the number of periods for an investment based on periodic, constant payments and a constant interest rate.
0 or omitted
At the end of the period

Public Function Npv (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object, Optional Arg4 As Object, Optional Arg5 As Object, Optional Arg6 As Object, Optional Arg7 As Object, Optional Arg8 As Object, Optional Arg9 As Object, Optional Arg10 As Object, Optional Arg11 As Object, Optional Arg12 As Object, Optional Arg13 As Object, Optional Arg14 As Object, Optional Arg15 As Object, Optional Arg16 As Object, Optional Arg17 As Object, Optional Arg18 As Object, Optional Arg19 As Object, Optional Arg20 As Object, Optional Arg21 As Object, Optional Arg22 As Object, Optional Arg23 As Object, Optional Arg24 As Object, Optional Arg25 As Object, Optional Arg26 As Object, Optional Arg27 As Object, Optional Arg28 As Object, Optional Arg29 As Object, Optional Arg30 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Rate - 某一期间的贴现率。

span.span: Rate - the rate of discount over the length of one period.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Value1, value2, ... - 代表支出及收入的 1 到 29 个参数。

span.span: Value1, value2, ... - 1 to 29 arguments representing the payments and income.

summary.span: 通过使用贴现率以及一系列未来支出（负值）和收入（正值），计算一项投资的净现值。

span.span: Calculates the net present value of an investment by using a discount rate and a series of future payments (negative values) and income (positive values).

para.span: Value1, value2, ... 在时间上必须具有相等间隔，并且都发生在期末。

span.span: Value1, value2, ... must be equally spaced in time and occur at the end of each period.

para.span: Npv 使用 value1、 value2、 ... 的顺序解释现金流的顺序。

span.span: Npv uses the order of value1, value2, ... to interpret the order of cash flows.

para.span: 所以务必保证支出和收入的数额按正确的顺序输入。

span.span: Be sure to enter your payment and income values in the correct sequence.

para.span: 如果参数为数值、空白单元格、逻辑值或数字的文本表达式，则都会计算在内；如果参数是错误值或不能转化为数值的文本，则被忽略。

span.span: Arguments that are numbers, empty cells, logical values, or text representations of numbers are counted; arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers are ignored.

para.span: 如果参数是一个数组或引用，则只计算其中的数字。数组或引用中的空白单元格、逻辑值、文本或错误值将被忽略。

span.span: If an argument is an array or reference, only numbers in that array or reference are counted. Empty cells, logical values, text, or error values in the array or reference are ignored.

para.span: Npv投资从 value1 现金流日期前的一个期间开始，以列表中的最后一个现金流结束。

span.span: The Npv investment begins one period before the date of the value1 cash flow and ends with the last cash flow in the list.

para.span: Npv计算基于未来的现金流。

span.span: The Npv calculation is based on future cash flows.

para.span: 如果第一个现金流发生在第一个周期的开头，则必须将第一个值添加到 Npv 结果中，而不是值参数中。

span.span: If your first cash flow occurs at the beginning of the first period, the first value must be added to the Npv result, not included in the values arguments.

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅下面的示例。

span.span: For more information, see the examples below.

para.span: 如果 n 是值列表中的现金流数，则 Npv 的公式 为：

span.span: If n is the number of cash flows in the list of values, the formula for Npv is:

para.span: 图 1：Npv 方法的公式

span.span: Figure 1: Formula for the Npv method

para.span: Npv 类似于当前 值 (函数) 。

span.span: Npv is similar to the function (present value).

para.span: PV 和 Npv 之间的主要区别在于，允许现金流在期末或期 初开始。

span.span: The primary difference between PV and Npv is that allows cash flows to begin either at the end or at the beginning of the period.

para.span: 与可变 的 Npv 现金流值不同， 现金流在整个投资过程中必须保持不变。

span.span: Unlike the variable Npv cash flow values, cash flows must be constant throughout the investment.

para.span: 有关年金和财务函数的信息，请参阅 。

span.span: For information about annuities and financial functions, see .

para.span: Npv 还与 函数 (内部返回率) 。

span.span: Npv is also related to the function (internal rate of return).

para.span: 是 Npv 等于零的速率：NPV (IRR (...) ，...) = 0。

span.span: is the rate for which Npv equals zero: NPV(IRR(...), ...) = 0.

param.name: Arg1

span.span: Number - the octal number you want to convert. Number may not contain more than 10 characters. The most significant bit of number is the sign bit. The remaining 29 bits are magnitude bits. Negative numbers are represented using two's-complement notation.

span.span: Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).

summary.span: 将八进制数转换为二进制数。

span.span: Converts an octal number to binary.

para.span: 如果 number 为负数 ，Oct2Bin 将忽略 places 并返回一个 10 个字符的二进制数。

span.span: If number is negative, Oct2Bin ignores places and returns a 10-character binary number.

para.span: 如果参数 number 为负数，不能小于 7777777000；如果参数 Number 为正数，不能大于 777。

span.span: If number is negative, it cannot be less than 7777777000, and if number is positive, it cannot be greater than 777.

para.span: 如果 number 不是有效的八进制数 ，Oct2Bin 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If number is not a valid octal number, Oct2Bin returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 Oct2Bin 所需的字符数多于 places 字符数，则返回#NUM！

span.span: If Oct2Bin requires more than places characters, it returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 places 不是整数，则将被截尾取整。

span.span: If places is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果 places 为非数字 ，Oct2Bin 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If places is nonnumeric, Oct2Bin returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 places 为负数 ，Oct2Bin 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If places is negative, Oct2Bin returns the #NUM!
error value.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Oct2Dec (object Arg1);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Oct2Dec([in]object Arg1) runtime managed
Public Function Oct2Dec (Arg1 As Object) As String
public: System::String ^ Oct2Dec(System::Object ^ Arg1);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Number - 要转换的八进制数。Number 不能多于 10 个八进制字符（30 个二进制位）。最高有效位为符号位，其余 29 位为数字位。负数用二进制数的补码表示。

span.span: Number - the octal number you want to convert. Number may not contain more than 10 octal characters (30 bits). The most significant bit of number is the sign bit. The remaining 29 bits are magnitude bits. Negative numbers are represented using two's-complement notation.

summary.span: 将八进制数转换为十进制数。

span.span: Converts an octal number to decimal.

para.span: 如果 number 不是有效的八进制数 ，Oct2Dec 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If number is not a valid octal number, Oct2Dec returns the #NUM!
error value.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Number - 要转换的八进制数。Number 不能多于 10 个八进制字符（30 个二进制位）。最高有效位为符号位，其余 29 位为数字位。负数用二进制数的补码表示。

span.span: Number - the octal number you want to convert. Number may not contain more than 10 octal characters (30 bits). The most significant bit of number is the sign bit. The remaining 29 bits are magnitude bits. Negative numbers are represented using two's-complement notation.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Places - 要使用的字符数。

span.span: Places - the number of characters to use.

param.span: 如果省略 places，Oct2Hex 将使用所需的最少字符数。

span.span: If places is omitted, Oct2Hex uses the minimum number of characters necessary.

param.span: 当需要为返回的值填充前导 0（零）时，places 尤其有用。

span.span: Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).

Public Function Odd (Arg1 As Double) As Double
public: double Odd(double Arg1);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Number - 是要进行舍入的值。

span.span: Number - the value to round.

summary.span: 返回数字向上舍入到的最接近的奇数。

span.span: Returns number rounded up to the nearest odd integer.

para.span: 如果 number 为非数字， 则 Odd 返回#VALUE！

span.span: If number is nonnumeric, Odd returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 不论数字符号如何，都按远离零来进行舍入。如果 number 正好是奇数，则不进行任何舍入。

span.span: Regardless of the sign of number, a value is rounded up when adjusted away from zero. If number is an odd integer, no rounding occurs.

param.span: Issue - 债券的发行日。

span.span: Issue - the security's issue date.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: First_coupon - 债券的首期付息日。

span.span: First_coupon - the security's first coupon date.

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Rate - 债券的利率。

span.span: Rate - the security's interest rate.

span.span: Yld - the security's annual yield.

summary.span: 返回首期付息日不固定（长期或短期）的面值 ￥100 的债券价格。

span.span: Returns the price per $100 face value of a security having an odd (short or long) first period.
0 or omitted

description.span: 美国（美国证券交易商协会）30/360

span.span: US (NASD) 30/360
Actual/actual
Actual/360
Actual/365
European 30/360

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 结算日是购买者买入息票（如债券）的日期。到期日是息票有效期截止时的日期。例如，在 2008 年 1 月 1 日发行的 30 年期债券，六个月后被购买者买走。则发行日为 2008 年 1 月 1 日，结算日为 2008 年 7 月 1 日，而到期日则是在发行日 2008 年 1 月 1 日的 30 年后，即 2038 年 1 月 1 日。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, which is 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

para.span: Settlement、maturity、issue、first_coupon 和 basis 将被截尾取整。

span.span: Settlement, maturity, issue, first_coupon, and basis are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 settlement、maturity、issue 或 first_coupon 不是有效日期 ，OddFPrice 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If settlement, maturity, issue, or first_coupon is not a valid date, OddFPrice returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 rate < 0 或 yld < 0，OddFPrice 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If rate < 0 or if yld < 0, OddFPrice returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 basis < 0 或 basis > 4，OddFPrice 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If basis < 0 or if basis > 4, OddFPrice returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 必须满足以下日期条件;否则 ，OddFPrice 将返回#NUM！

span.span: The following date condition must be satisfied; otherwise, OddFPrice returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值：

span.span: error value:

para.span: maturity > first_coupon > settlement > issue

span.span: maturity > first_coupon > settlement > issue

para.span: OddFPrice 的计算公式如下：奇数短首付息：

span.span: OddFPrice is calculated as follows: Odd short first coupon:

para.span: 图 1：奇数短首付息

span.span: Figure 1: Odd short first coupon

para.span: 其中：

span.span: where:

para.span: A = 从息票期开始到结算日（即 (日）) 。

span.span: A = number of days from the beginning of the coupon period to the settlement date (accrued days).

para.span: DSC = 从结算日到下一个息票日期的天数。

span.span: DSC = number of days from the settlement to the next coupon date.

para.span: DFC = 从奇数第一张息票开始到第一张息票日期的天数。

span.span: DFC = number of days from the beginning of the odd first coupon to the first coupon date.

para.span: E = 息票期中的天数。

span.span: E = number of days in the coupon period.

para.span: N = 结算日与兑换日之间可支付的息票数量。

span.span: N = number of coupons payable between the settlement date and the redemption date.

para.span: (如果此数字包含一个分数，则它将引发到下一个)

span.span: (If this number contains a fraction, it is raised to the next whole number.)

para.span: 奇数长首期息票：

span.span: Odd long first coupon:

para.span: 图 2：奇数长首期息票

span.span: Figure 2: Odd long first coupon

para.span: 其中：

span.span: where:

para.span: Ai = 自第 i 个周期开始（或奇数期间的最后一个息票期）开始的天数。

span.span: Ai = number of days from the beginning of the ith, or last, quasi-coupon period within odd period.

para.span: DCi = 从过期日期 (或发行日期) 到第一次发行息票日 (i = 1) 的天数，或 (付息日 (i = 2,..., i = NC) 。

span.span: DCi = number of days from dated date (or issue date) to first quasi-coupon (i = 1) or number of days in quasi-coupon (i = 2,..., i = NC).

para.span: DSC = 从结算日到下一个息票日的日期天数。

span.span: DSC = number of days from settlement to next coupon date.

para.span: E = 息票期的天数。

span.span: E = number of days in coupon period.

para.span: N = 第一个实际息票日期和兑换日之间可支付的息票数量。

span.span: N = number of coupons payable between the first real coupon date and redemption date.

para.span: (如果此数字包含一个分数，则它将引发到下一个)

span.span: (If this number contains a fraction, it is raised to the next whole number.)

para.span: NC = 适合奇数期的息票期数。

span.span: NC = number of quasi-coupon periods that fit in odd period.

para.span: (如果此数字包含一个分数，则它将引发到下一个)

span.span: (If this number contains a fraction, it is raised to the next whole number.)

para.span: NLi = 正常长度，以第一个完整周期的天数或奇数期的最后一个息票期表示。

span.span: NLi = normal length in days of the full ith, or last, quasi-coupon period within odd period.

para.span: Nq = 结算日与第一张息票之间整个息票息期数。

span.span: Nq = number of whole quasi-coupon periods between settlement date and first coupon.

para.span: Excel 使用迭代技术计算OddFYield。

span.span: Excel uses an iterative technique to calculate OddFYield.

para.span: 此函数基于用于函数的公式使用 Newton 方法 。

span.span: This function uses the Newton method based on the formula used for the function .

para.span: 在 100 次迭代过程中，收益率不断变化，直到按给定收益率导出的估计价格接近实际价格。

span.span: The yield is changed through 100 iterations until the estimated price with the given yield is close to the price.

para.span: 请参阅 OddFYield 使用的 公式。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, which is 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

para.span: Settlement、maturity、last_interest 和 basis 将被截尾取整。

span.span: Settlement, maturity, last_interest, and basis are truncated to integers.

error value.

error value.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: Ai = 从兑换前的最后一个利息日期向前计数的奇数周期内第 i 个或最后一个息票期的累算天数。

span.span: Ai = number of accrued days for the ith, or last, quasi-coupon period within odd period counting forward from last interest date before redemption.

span.span: NC = number of quasi-coupon periods that fit in odd period; if this number contains a fraction it will be raised to the next whole number.

para.span: NLi = 奇数息票期的第 i 天或最后一个息票期的正常长度（以天表示）。

span.span: NLi = normal length in days of the ith, or last, quasi-coupon period within odd coupon period.

span.span: Returns the k-th percentile of values in a range. You can use this function to establish a threshold of acceptance. For example, you can decide to examine candidates who score above the 90th percentile.

span.span: If k is < 0 or if k > 1, Percentile returns the #NUM!

span.span: If k is not a multiple of 1/(n - 1), Percentile interpolates to determine the value at the k-th percentile.

para.span: 重要提示：日期应该使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.
0 or omitted

description.span: 美国（美国证券交易商协会）30/360

span.span: US (NASD) 30/360
Actual/actual
Actual/360
Actual/365
European 30/360

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 结算日是购买者买入息票（如债券）的日期。到期日是息票有效期截止时的日期。例如，在 2008 年 1 月 1 日发行的 30 年期债券，六个月后被购买者买走。则发行日为 2008 年 1 月 1 日，结算日为 2008 年 7 月 1 日，而到期日则是在发行日 2008 年 1 月 1 日的 30 年后，即 2038 年 1 月 1 日。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, which is 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, which is 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

Public Function Prob (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Arg3 As Double, Optional Arg4 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: X_range - 具有各自相应概率值的 x 数值区域。

span.span: X_range - the range of numeric values of x with which there are associated probabilities.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Prob_range - 与 x_range 中的值相对应的一组概率值。

span.span: Prob_range - a set of probabilities associated with values in x_range.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Lower_limit - 用于计算概率的数值下界。

span.span: Lower_limit - the lower bound on the value for which you want a probability.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Upper_limit - 用于计算概率的可选数值上界。

span.span: Upper_limit - the optional upper bound on the value for which you want a probability.

summary.span: 返回区域中的数值落在指定区间内的概率。如果没有给出上限 (upper_limit)，则返回区间 x_range 内的值等于下限 lower_limit 的概率。

span.span: Returns the probability that values in a range are between two limits. If upper_limit is not supplied, returns the probability that values in x_range are equal to lower_limit.

para.span: 如果值为 prob_range ≤ 0 或 prob_range 1 中的任意值，则 Prob 将返回 > #NUM！

span.span: If any value in prob_range ≤ 0 or if any value in prob_range > 1, Prob returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果值之和为 prob_range ¹ 1，则 Prob 返回 #NUM！

span.span: If the sum of the values in prob_range ¹ 1, Prob returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果upper_limit， 则 Prob 将返回等于 lower_limit。

span.span: If upper_limit is omitted, Prob returns the probability of being equal to lower_limit.

para.span: 如果 x_range 和 prob_range包含不同数量的数据点， 则 Prob 将返回 #N/A 错误值。

span.span: If x_range and prob_range contain a different number of data points, Prob returns the #N/A error value.

span.span: Multiplies all the numbers given as arguments and returns the product.

para.span: 如果参数为数字、逻辑值或数字的文本表达式，则这些参数将计算在内；如果参数为错误值或无法转换为数字的文本，则将产生错误。

span.span: Arguments that are numbers, logical values, or text representations of numbers are counted; arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers cause errors.

para.span: 如果参数为数组或引用，只有其中的数字将被计算。数组或引用中的空白单元格、逻辑值、文本或错误值将被忽略。

span.span: If an argument is an array or reference, only numbers in the array or reference are counted. Empty cells, logical values, text, or error values in the array or reference are ignored.

summary.span: 将文本字符串的首字母及任何非字母字符之后的首字母转换成大写。将其余的字母转换成小写。

span.span: Capitalizes the first letter in a text string and any other letters in text that follow any character other than a letter. Converts all other letters to lowercase letters.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Pv (double Arg1, double Arg2, double Arg3, object Arg4, object Arg5);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 Pv([in]float64 Arg1, [in]float64 Arg2, [in]float64 Arg3, [in]object Arg4, [in]object Arg5) runtime managed
Public Function Pv (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Double, Arg3 As Double, Optional Arg4 As Object, Optional Arg5 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Rate - 各期利率。例如，如果按 10% 的年利率借入一笔贷款来购买汽车，并按月偿还贷款，则月利率为 10%/12（即 0.83%）。可以在公式中输入 10%/12、0.83% 或 0.0083 作为 rate 的值。

span.span: Rate - the interest rate per period. For example, if you obtain an automobile loan at a 10 percent annual interest rate and make monthly payments, your interest rate per month is 10%/12, or 0.83%. You would enter 10%/12, or 0.83%, or 0.0083, into the formula as the rate.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Nper - 年金中的总付款期数。例如，对于一笔四年期按月偿还的汽车贷款，共有 4\*12（即 48）个偿款期数。可以在公式中输入 48 作为 nper 的值。

span.span: Nper - the total number of payment periods in an annuity. For example, if you get a four-year car loan and make monthly payments, your loan has 4\*12 (or 48) periods. You would enter 48 into the formula for nper.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Pmt - 各期所应支付的金额，其数值在整个年金期间保持不变。通常 pmt 包括本金和利息，但不包括其他费用或税款。例如，￥10,000 的年利率为 12% 的四年期汽车贷款的月偿还额为 ￥263.33。可以在公式中输入 -263.33 作为 pmt 的值。如果省略 pmt，则必须包含 fv 参数。

span.span: Pmt - the payment made each period and cannot change over the life of the annuity. Typically, pmt includes principal and interest but no other fees or taxes. For example, the monthly payments on a $10,000, four-year car loan at 12 percent are $263.33. You would enter -263.33 into the formula as the pmt. If pmt is omitted, you must include the fv argument.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Fv - 未来值，或在最后一次付款后希望得到的现金余额。如果省略 fv，则假定其值为 0（例如，一笔贷款的未来值为 0）。例如，如果希望通过存款在 18 年后为某一特殊项目支付 ￥50,000，则 ￥50,000 就是未来值。可以根据保守估计的利率来决定每月的存款额。如果省略 fv，则必须包含 pmt 参数。

span.span: Fv - the future value, or a cash balance you want to attain after the last payment is made. If fv is omitted, it is assumed to be 0 (the future value of a loan, for example, is 0). For example, if you want to save $50,000 to pay for a special project in 18 years, then $50,000 is the future value. You could then make a conservative guess at an interest rate and determine how much you must save each month. If fv is omitted, you must include the pmt argument.

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Type - 数字 0 或 1，用以指示付款时间。

span.span: Type - the number 0 or 1 and indicates when payments are due.

summary.span: 返回投资的现值。现值为一系列未来付款的当前值的累积和。例如，借入方的借入款即为贷出方贷款的现值。

span.span: Returns the present value of an investment. The present value is the total amount that a series of future payments is worth now. For example, when you borrow money, the loan amount is the present value to the lender.
0 or omitted
At the end of the period
At the beginning of the period

para.span: 请确保用于指定 rate 和 nper 的单位的一致性。例如，同样是四年期年利率为 12% 的贷款，如果按月支付，rate 应为 12%/12，nper 应为 4\*12；如果按年支付，rate 应为 12%，nper 为 4。

span.span: Make sure that you are consistent about the units you use for specifying rate and nper. If you make monthly payments on a four-year loan at 12 percent annual interest, use 12%/12 for rate and 4\*12 for nper. If you make annual payments on the same loan, use 12% for rate and 4 for nper.

para.span: 以下函数适用于年金：

span.span: The following functions apply to annuities:
CUMIPMT
PPMT
CUMPRINC
PV
FV
RATE
FVSCHEDULE
XIRR
IPMT
XNPV
PMT

para.span: 年金是连续期间一系列固定现金付款。

span.span: An annuity is a series of constant cash payments made over a continuous period.

para.span: 例如汽车贷款或购房贷款就是年金。

span.span: For example, a car loan or a mortgage is an annuity.

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅各年金函数的详细说明。

span.span: For more information, see the description for each annuity function.

para.span: 在年金函数中，支出的款项，如银行存款，表示为负数；收入的款项，如股息收入，表示为正数。例如，对于储户来说，$1000 银行存款可表示为参数 -1,000，而对于银行来说该参数为 1,000。

span.span: In annuity functions, cash you pay out, such as a deposit to savings, is represented by a negative number; cash you receive, such as a dividend check, is represented by a positive number. For example, a $1,000 deposit to the bank would be represented by the argument -1000 if you are the depositor and by the argument 1000 if you are the bank.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 用另一个财务参数求解另一个财务参数。

span.span: Microsoft Excel solves for one financial argument in terms of the others.

para.span: 如果 rate 不为 0，则：

span.span: If rate is not 0, then:

para.span: 图 1：rate 不为 0 的公式

span.span: Figure 1: Equation when rate is not 0

para.span: 如果 rate 为 0，则：

span.span: If rate is 0, then:

para.span: (pmt\ * nper) + pv + fv = 0

span.span: (pmt \* nper) + pv + fv = 0

MemberSignature.Value: public double Rank (double Arg1, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range Arg2, object Arg3);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 Rank([in]float64 Arg1, [in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range Arg2, [in]object Arg3) runtime managed
Public Function Rank (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Range, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: number - 要查找其排位的数字。

span.span: Number - the number whose rank you want to find.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: ref - 数字列表数组或对数字列表的引用。

span.span: Ref - an array of, or a reference to, a list of numbers.

param.span: ref 中的非数值型值将被忽略。

span.span: Nonnumeric values in ref are ignored.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Order - 指定数字的排位方式的数字。

span.span: Order - a number specifying how to rank number.

summary.span: 返回一个数字在数字列表中的排位。数字的排位是其大小与列表中其他值的比值（如果列表已排过序，则数字的排位就是它当前的位置）。

span.span: Returns the rank of a number in a list of numbers. The rank of a number is its size relative to other values in a list. (If you were to sort the list, the rank of the number would be its position.)

para.span: 重要说明：此函数已被替换为一个或多个新函数，这些函数可提供更高的准确性，并且名称可以更好地反映其用法。

span.span: Important: This function has been replaced with one or more new functions that may provide improved accuracy and whose names better reflect their usage.

para.span: 此函数仍可用于与早期版本的 Excel 兼容。

span.span: This function is still available for compatibility with earlier versions of Excel.

para.span: 但是，如果不需要向后兼容性，则应考虑从现在开始使用新函数，因为它们可以更准确地描述其功能。

span.span: However, if backward compatibility is not required, you should consider using the new functions from now on, because they more accurately describe their functionality.

para.span: 有关新函数的信息，请参阅 方法 。

span.span: For more information about the new functions, see the and methods.

para.span: 如果 order 为 0（零）或被省略，Microsoft Excel 会按照 ref 为按降序排序的列表对数字排位。

span.span: If order is 0 (zero) or omitted, Microsoft Excel ranks number as if ref were a list sorted in descending order.

para.span: 如果 order 不为零，Microsoft Excel 会按照 ref 为按升序排序的列表对数字排位。

span.span: If order is any nonzero value, Microsoft Excel ranks number as if ref were a list sorted in ascending order.

para.span: 排名 为重复数字提供相同的排名。

span.span: Rank gives duplicate numbers the same rank.

para.span: 但重复数的存在将影响后续数字的排位。

span.span: However, the presence of duplicate numbers affects the ranks of subsequent numbers.

para.span: 例如，在一列按升序排列的整数中，如果数字 10 出现两次，其排位为 5，则 11 的排位为 7（没有排位为 6 的数字）。

span.span: For example, in a list of integers sorted in ascending order, if the number 10 appears twice and has a rank of 5, then 11 would have a rank of 7 (no number would have a rank of 6).

para.span: 出于某些目的，你可能想要使用将关系考虑在内的排名定义。

span.span: For some purposes one might want to use a definition of rank that takes ties into account.

para.span: 在上一示例中，10 的修改后的排名为 5.5。

span.span: In the previous example, one would want a revised rank of 5.5 for the number 10.

para.span: 这可以通过将以下更正因素添加到 Rank 返回 的值来完成。

span.span: This can be done by adding the following correction factor to the value returned by Rank.

para.span: 此更正因数适用于按降序计算排名的情况 (顺序 = 0 或省略) 或升序 (顺序 = 非零值) 。

span.span: This correction factor is appropriate both for the case where rank is computed in descending order (order = 0 or omitted) or ascending order (order = nonzero value).

para.span: 关联排名的更正因素=[COUNT (ref) + 1 – RANK (number， ref， 0) – RANK (number， ref， 1) ]/2。

span.span: Correction factor for tied ranks=[COUNT(ref) + 1 – RANK(number, ref, 0) – RANK(number, ref, 1)]/2.

para.span: 在下面的示例中，RANK (A2，A1：A5，1) 等于 3。

span.span: In the following example, RANK(A2,A1:A5,1) equals 3.

para.span: 更正系数为 (5 + 1 – 2 – 3) /2 = 0.5，并且将关系考虑在内的修订排名为 3 + 0.5 = 3.5。

span.span: The correction factor is (5 + 1 – 2 – 3)/2 = 0.5 and the revised rank that takes ties into account is 3 + 0.5 = 3.5.

para.span: 如果 number 仅在 ref 中出现一次，则更正系数将为0，因为不需要为等号调整排名。

span.span: If number occurs only once in ref, the correction factor will be 0, since Rank would not have to be adjusted for a tie.

Public Function Rank_Avg (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Range, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1

span.span: Non-numeric values in reference are ignored.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Order - 一个数字，指定如何对数字进行排名。

span.span: Order - A number that specifies how to rank number.

param.span: 如果 order 为 0（零）或被省略，Microsoft Excel 会按照引用为按降序排序的列表对数字排位。

span.span: If the order is 0 (zero) or omitted, Microsoft Excel ranks the number as if the reference was a list sorted in descending order.

param.span: 如果 order 的值不是零，Microsoft Excel 会按照引用为按升序排序的列表对数字排位。

span.span: If the order is any non-zero value, Microsoft Excel ranks number as if the reference were a list sorted in ascending order.

summary.span: 返回一个数字在数字列表中的排位；即该数字与列表中其他值的相对大小。如果有多个值的排位相同，则将返回平均排位。

span.span: Returns the rank of a number in a list of numbers; that is its size relative to other values in the list. If more than one value has the same rank, the average rank is returned.

param.name: Arg1

param.name: Arg2

span.span: Ref - An array of, or a reference to, a list of numbers.

param.span: 引用中的非数值型值将被忽略。

param.name: Arg3
param.span: order - 一个指定数字的排位方式的数字。

span.span: Order - A number that specifies how to rank the number.

summary.span: 返回一个数字在数字列表中的排位。数字的排位是其大小与列表中其他值的比值（如果列表已排过序，则数字的排位就是它当前的位置）。

span.span: Returns the rank of a number in a list of numbers. The rank of a number is its size relative to other values in a list. (If you were to sort the list, the rank of the number would be its position.)

para.span: 如果 order 为 0（零）或被省略，Microsoft Excel 会按照引用为按降序排序的列表对数字排位。

span.span: If the order is 0 (zero) or omitted, Microsoft Excel ranks the number as if the reference was a list sorted in descending order.

para.span: 如果 order 的值不是零，Microsoft Excel 会按照引用为按升序排序的列表对数字排位。

span.span: If the order is any non-zero value, Microsoft Excel ranks the number as if the reference was a list sorted in ascending order.

para.span: Rank_Eq 重复数字的排位相同。

span.span: Rank_Eq gives duplicate numbers the same rank.

para.span: 但重复数的存在将影响后续数字的排位。

span.span: However, the presence of duplicate numbers affects the ranks of subsequent numbers.

para.span: 例如，在一列按升序排列的整数中，如果数字 10 出现两次，其排位为 5，则 11 的排位为 7（没有排位为 6 的数字）。

span.span: For example, in a list of integers sorted in ascending order, if the number 10 appears twice and has a rank of 5, then 11 would have a rank of 7 (no number would have a rank of 6).

para.span: 出于某些目的，你可能想要使用将关系考虑在内的排名定义。

span.span: For some purposes you might want to use a definition of rank that takes ties into account.

para.span: 在上一示例中，您希望数字 10 的修订排名为 5.5。

span.span: In the previous example, you would want a revised rank of 5.5 for the number 10.

para.span: 为此，将以下更正因数添加到由 Rank_Eq 。

span.span: To do this, add the following correction factor to the value returned by Rank_Eq.

para.span: 此更正因数适用于按降序计算排名的情况 (顺序 = 0 或省略) 或升序 (顺序 = 非零值) 。

span.span: This correction factor is appropriate both for the case where rank is computed in descending order (order = 0 or omitted) or ascending order (order = nonzero value).

para.span: 关联排名的更正系数=[COUNT (ref) + 1 – RANK_EQ (number， ref， 0) – RANK_EQ (number， ref， 1) ]/2。在下面的示例中，RANK_EQ (A2，A1：A5，1) 等于 3。

span.span: Correction factor for tied ranks=[COUNT(ref) + 1 – RANK_EQ(number, ref, 0) – RANK_EQ(number, ref, 1)]/2.In the following example, RANK_EQ(A2,A1:A5,1) equals 3.

para.span: 更正系数为 (5 + 1 – 2 – 3) /2 = 0.5，并且将关系考虑在内的修订排名为 3 + 0.5 = 3.5。

span.span: The correction factor is (5 + 1 – 2 – 3)/2 = 0.5 and the revised rank that takes ties into account is 3 + 0.5 = 3.5.

para.span: 如果数字在引用中只出现一次，则更正系数将为 0， 因为 Rank_Eq不需要为等号进行调整。

span.span: If number occurs only once in ref, the correction factor will be 0, since Rank_Eq would not have to be adjusted for a tie.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Rate (double Arg1, double Arg2, double Arg3, object Arg4, object Arg5, object Arg6);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 Rate([in]float64 Arg1, [in]float64 Arg2, [in]float64 Arg3, [in]object Arg4, [in]object Arg5, [in]object Arg6) runtime managed
Public Function Rate (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Double, Arg3 As Double, Optional Arg4 As Object, Optional Arg5 As Object, Optional Arg6 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Nper - 年金中的总付款期数。

span.span: Nper - the total number of payment periods in an annuity.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Pmt - 各期付款额，其数值在年金的整个时间期限内保持不变。通常 pmt 包括本金和利息，但不包括其他费用或税金。如果省略 pmt，则必须包含 fv 参数。

span.span: Pmt - the payment made each period and cannot change over the life of the annuity. Typically, pmt includes principal and interest but no other fees or taxes. If pmt is omitted, you must include the fv argument.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Pv - 现值 — 即一系列未来付款当前所值的总额。

span.span: Pv - the present value — the total amount that a series of future payments is worth now.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Fv - 未来值，或在最后一次付款后希望得到的现金余额。如果省略 fv，则假定其值为 0（例如，一笔贷款的未来值为 0）。

span.span: Fv - the future value, or a cash balance you want to attain after the last payment is made. If fv is omitted, it is assumed to be 0 (the future value of a loan, for example, is 0).

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Type - 数字 0 或 1，用以指示付款时间。

span.span: Type - the number 0 or 1 and indicates when payments are due.

param.name: Arg6
param.span: Guess - 你对速率的猜测。

span.span: Guess - your guess for what the rate will be.

summary.span: 返回年金的各期利率。函数 RATE 通过迭代法计算得出，并且可能无解或有多个解。如果在进行 20 次迭代计算后，函数 RATE 的相邻两次结果没有收敛于 0.0000001，则函数 RATE 将返回错误值 #NUM!。

span.span: Returns the interest rate per period of an annuity. RATE is calculated by iteration and can have zero or more solutions. If the successive results of RATE do not converge to within 0.0000001 after 20 iterations, RATE returns the #NUM! error value.

para.span: 有关参数 nper、pmt、pv、fv 和类型的完整说明，请参阅 。

span.span: For a complete description of the arguments nper, pmt, pv, fv, and type, see .
0 or omitted
At the end of the period
At the beginning of the period

para.span: 如果省略 guess，则假定其值为 10%。

span.span: If you omit guess, it is assumed to be 10 percent.

para.span: 如果 Rate 不收敛，请尝试不同的 guess 值。

span.span: If Rate does not converge, try different values for guess.

para.span: 如果 guess 介于 0 和 1 之间，则速率通常会收敛。

span.span: Rate usually converges if guess is between 0 and 1.

para.span: 应确保所指定的 guess 和 nper 单位的一致性。例如，同样是四年期年利率为 12% 的贷款，如果按月支付，guess 应为 12%/12，nper 应为 4\*12；如果按年支付，guess 应为 12%，nper 应为 4。

span.span: Make sure that you are consistent about the units you use for specifying guess and nper. If you make monthly payments on a four-year loan at 12 percent annual interest, use 12%/12 for guess and 4\*12 for nper. If you make annual payments on the same loan, use 12% for guess and 4 for nper.

span.span: Returns the amount received at maturity for a fully invested security.

para.span: 重要提示：日期应该使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 结算日是购买者买入息票（如债券）的日期。到期日是息票有效期截止时的日期。例如，假设在 2008 年 1 月 1 日发行的 30 年期债券，六个月后被购买者买走，则发行日为 2008 年 1 月 1 日，结算日为 2008 年 7 月 1 日，而到期日则是在发行日 2008 年 1 月 1 日的 30 年后，即 2038 年 1 月 1 日。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, which is 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

para.span: Settlement、maturity 和 basis 将被截尾取整。

span.span: Settlement, maturity, and basis are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 settlement 或 maturity 不是有效日期 ，Received 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If settlement or maturity is not a valid date, Received returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 investment ≤ 0 或 discount ≤ 0，Received 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If investment ≤ 0 or if discount ≤ 0, Received returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 basis < 0 或 basis > 4，Received 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If basis < 0 or if basis > 4, Received returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 settlement ≥ maturity，Received 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If settlement ≥ maturity, Received returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 重要提示：适用于使用单字节字符集 (SBCS) 的语言，而 ReplaceB 用于使用双字节字符集 (DBCS ) 的语言。

span.span: Important: is intended for use with languages that use the single-byte character set (SBCS), whereas ReplaceB is intended for use with languages that use the double-byte character set (DBCS).

para.span: 计算机上的默认语言设置会以下列方式影响返回值：

span.span: The default language setting on your computer affects the return value in the following way:

para.span: 无论默认语言设置是什么，始终将每个字符（无论是单字节还是双字节）计为 1。

span.span: always counts each character, whether single-byte or double-byte, as 1, no matter what the default language setting is.

para.span: 如果启用了对支持 DBCS 的语言的编辑，并将其设置为默认语言 ，ReplaceB将每个双字节字符计为 2。

span.span: ReplaceB counts each double-byte character as 2 when you have enabled the editing of a language that supports DBCS and then set it as the default language.

para.span: 否则 ，ReplaceB 将每个字符计为 1。

span.span: Otherwise, ReplaceB counts each character as 1.

para.span: 支持 DBCS 的语言包括日语、中文（简体）、中文（繁体）和朝鲜语。

span.span: The languages that support DBCS include Japanese, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), and Korean.

span.span: Returns the square of the Pearson product moment correlation coefficient through data points in known_y's and known_x's.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

span.span: For more information, see .

summary.span: R 平方值可以解释为 y 方差与 x 方差的比例。

span.span: The r-squared value can be interpreted as the proportion of the variance in y attributable to the variance in x.

para.span: 参数可以是数字，也可以是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: Arguments can either be numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 直接键入参数列表的数字的逻辑值和文本表示也包括在内。

span.span: Logical values and text representations of numbers that you type directly into the list of arguments are counted.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但含有零值的单元格包括在内。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: 如果参数为错误值或不能转换为数字的文本，则将导致错误。

span.span: Arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers cause errors.

para.span: 如果 known_y 和 known_x 为空或数据点数不同， 则 RSq 将返回 #N/A 错误值。

span.span: If known_y's and known_x's are empty or have a different number of data points, RSq returns the #N/A error value.

para.span: 如果 known_y 和 known_x 仅包含 1 个数据点，则 RSq 返回 #DIV/0！

span.span: If known_y's and known_x's contain only 1 data point, RSq returns the #DIV/0!
error value.

para.span: Pearson 产品时刻相关系数 r 的公式为：

span.span: The equation for the Pearson product moment correlation coefficient, r, is:

para.span: 图 1：Pearson 产品时刻相关系数

span.span: Figure 1: Pearson product moment correlation coefficient

para.span: 其中 x 和 y 是样本平均值 AVERAGE (known_x 的) AVERAGE (known_y平均值) 。

span.span: where x and y are the sample means AVERAGE(known_x’s) and AVERAGE(known_y’s).

para.span: RSq 返回 r2，这是此相关系数的平方。

span.span: RSq returns r2, which is the square of this correlation coefficient.

para.span: 计算机上的默认语言设置将按以下方式影响返回值：无论默认语言设置是什么，搜索 始终将每个字符（无论是单字节还是双字节）计数为 1。

span.span: The default language setting on your computer affects the return value in the following way:Search always counts each character, whether single-byte or double-byte, as 1, no matter what the default language setting is.

para.span: 启用支持 DBCS 的语言的编辑，然后将它设置为默认语言时，将每个双字节字符计算为 2。

para.span: 使用 搜索 并确定字符或文本字符串在另一个文本字符串中的位置，以便您可以使用 MID 和 MIDB 或函数 更改文本。

span.span: Use Search and to determine the location of a character or text string within another text string so that you can use the MID and MIDB or and functions to change the text.

para.span: 搜索 ，不区分大小写。

span.span: Search and are not case sensitive.

para.span: 如果要执行区分大小写的搜索，可以使用 和 。

span.span: If you want to do a case sensitive search, you can use and .

para.span: 可以在 find_text 中使用通配符，包括问号 (?) 和星号 (\*)。问号可匹配任意的单个字符；星号可匹配任意一串字符。如果要查找实际的问号或星号，则请在该字符前键入一个波形符 (~)。

span.span: You can use the wildcard characters, question mark (?) and asterisk (\*), in find_text. A question mark matches any single character; an asterisk matches any sequence of characters. If you want to find an actual question mark or asterisk, type a tilde (~) before the character.

para.span: 如果找不到 find_text，则返回错误值 #VALUE!。

span.span: If find_text is not found, the #VALUE! error value is returned.

para.span: 如果省略 start_num，则假定其值为 1。

span.span: If start_num is omitted, it is assumed to be 1.

para.span: 如果 start_num 不大于 0（零）或大于 within_text 的长度，则返回错误值 #VALUE!。

span.span: If start_num is not greater than 0 (zero) or is greater than the length of within_text, the #VALUE! error value is returned.

para.span: 使用 start_num 可跳过指定编号的字符。

span.span: Use start_num to skip a specified number of characters.

para.span: 以 搜索 为例，假设您使用的是文本字符串"AYF0093"。YoungMensApparel"。

span.span: Using Search as an example, suppose you are working with the text string "AYF0093.YoungMensApparel".

para.span: 要在文本字符串的说明部分中查找第一个“Y”的编号，请将 start_num 设置为等于 8，这样就不会搜索文本的序列号部分。

span.span: To find the number of the first "Y" in the descriptive part of the text string, set start_num equal to 8 so that the serial-number portion of the text is not searched.

para.span: 搜索 从字符 8 开始，find_text查找下一个字符，并返回数字 9。

span.span: Search begins with character 8, finds find_text at the next character, and returns the number 9.

para.span: 搜索 始终返回从开始within_text的字符数，如果 start_num大于 1，则计算跳过的字符数。

span.span: Search always returns the number of characters from the start of within_text, counting the characters you skip if start_num is greater than 1.

Public Function SearchB (Arg1 As String, Arg2 As String, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Find_text - 要查找的文本。

span.span: Find_text - the text you want to find.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Within_text - 要在其中搜索 find_text 的文本。

span.span: Within_text - the text in which you want to search for find_text.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Start_num - 在 within_text 中要从其开始搜索的字符编号。

span.span: Start_num - the character number in within_text at which you want to start searching.

summary.span: SEARCH 和 SEARCHB 查找一个文本字符串内的另一个文本字符串，并返回一个数字，表示从文本字符串（从中查找另一个文本字符串）的第一个字符起开始查找的第一个文本字符串的起始位置。

span.span: SEARCH and SEARCHB locate one text string within a second text string, and return the number of the starting position of the first text string from the first character of the second text string.

para.span: 重要提示：搜索用于使用单字节字符集 (SBCS) 的语言，而用于使用双字节字符集 ( DBCS) 的语言。

span.span: Important: Search is intended for use with languages that use the single-byte character set (SBCS), whereas is intended for use with languages that use the double-byte character set (DBCS).

para.span: 计算机上的默认语言设置将按以下方式影响返回值：无论默认语言设置是什么，搜索 始终将每个字符（无论是单字节还是双字节）计数为 1。

span.span: The default language setting on your computer affects the return value in the following way:Search always counts each character, whether single-byte or double-byte, as 1, no matter what the default language setting is.

para.span: 启用支持 DBCS 的语言的编辑，然后将它设置为默认语言时，将每个双字节字符计算为 2。

span.span: counts each double-byte character as 2 when you have enabled the editing of a language that supports DBCS and then set it as the default language.

para.span: 否则， 将每个字符计数为 1。

span.span: Otherwise, counts each character as 1.

para.span: 支持 DBCS 的语言包括日语、中文（简体）、中文（繁体）和朝鲜语。

span.span: The languages that support DBCS include Japanese, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), and Korean.

para.span: 使用 搜索 并确定字符或文本字符串在另一个文本字符串中的位置，以便您可以使用 MID 和 MIDB 或函数 更改文本。

span.span: Use Search and to determine the location of a character or text string within another text string so that you can use the MID and MIDB or and functions to change the text.

para.span: 搜索 ，不区分大小写。

span.span: Search and are not case sensitive.

para.span: 如果要执行区分大小写的搜索，可以使用 和 。

span.span: If you want to do a case sensitive search, you can use and .

para.span: 可以在 find_text 中使用通配符，包括问号 (?) 和星号 (\*)。问号可匹配任意的单个字符；星号可匹配任意一串字符。如果要查找实际的问号或星号，则请在该字符前键入一个波形符 (~)。

span.span: You can use the wildcard characters, question mark (?) and asterisk (\*), in find_text. A question mark matches any single character; an asterisk matches any sequence of characters. If you want to find an actual question mark or asterisk, type a tilde (~) before the character.

para.span: 如果找不到 find_text，则返回错误值 #VALUE!。

span.span: If find_text is not found, the #VALUE! error value is returned.

para.span: 如果省略 start_num，则假定其值为 1。

span.span: If start_num is omitted, it is assumed to be 1.

para.span: 如果 start_num 不大于 0（零）或大于 within_text 的长度，则返回错误值 #VALUE!。

span.span: If start_num is not greater than 0 (zero) or is greater than the length of within_text, the #VALUE! error value is returned.

para.span: 使用 start_num 可跳过指定编号的字符。

span.span: Use start_num to skip a specified number of characters.

para.span: 以 搜索 为例，假设您使用的是文本字符串"AYF0093"。YoungMensApparel"。

span.span: Using Search as an example, suppose you are working with the text string "AYF0093.YoungMensApparel".

para.span: 要在文本字符串的说明部分中查找第一个“Y”的编号，请将 start_num 设置为等于 8，这样就不会搜索文本的序列号部分。

span.span: To find the number of the first "Y" in the descriptive part of the text string, set start_num equal to 8 so that the serial-number portion of the text is not searched.

para.span: 搜索 从字符 8 开始，find_text下一个字符查找，并返回数字 9。

span.span: Search begins with character 8, finds find_text at the next character, and returns the number 9.

para.span: 搜索 始终返回从开始within_text的字符数，如果 start_num大于 1，则计算跳过的字符数。

span.span: Search always returns the number of characters from the start of within_text, counting the characters you skip if start_num is greater than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public double SeriesSum (object Arg1, object Arg2, object Arg3, object Arg4);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 SeriesSum([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]object Arg3, [in]object Arg4) runtime managed
Public Function SeriesSum (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Arg3 As Object, Arg4 As Object) As Double
public: double SeriesSum(System::Object ^ Arg1, System::Object ^ Arg2, System::Object ^ Arg3, System::Object ^ Arg4);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: X - 幂级数的输入值。

span.span: X - the input value to the power series.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: N - x 的首项乘幂。

span.span: N - the initial power to which you want to raise x.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: M - 级数中每一项的乘幂 n 的步长增加值。

span.span: M - the step by which to increase n for each term in the series.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Coefficients - 一系列与 x 各级乘幂相乘的系数。coefficients 中值的数目决定了幂级数的项数。例如，如果 coefficients 中有三个值，幂级数中将有三项。

span.span: Coefficients - a set of coefficients by which each successive power of x is multiplied. The number of values in coefficients determines the number of terms in the power series. For example, if there are three values in coefficients, then there will be three terms in the power series.

summary.span: 返回基于公式的电源系列的总和：SERIES (x，n，m，a) = a1xn+a2x (n+m) +a3x (n+2m) +...+aix (n+ (i-1) m)

span.span: Returns the sum of a power series based on the formula: SERIES(x,n,m,a)= a1xn+a2x(n+m)+a3x(n+2m)+…+aix(n+(i-1)m)

para.span: 如果任一参数为非数字， 则 SeriesSum 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If any argument is nonnumeric, SeriesSum returns the #VALUE!
error value.

Public Function Skew (Arg1 As Object, Optional Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object, Optional Arg4 As Object, Optional Arg5 As Object, Optional Arg6 As Object, Optional Arg7 As Object, Optional Arg8 As Object, Optional Arg9 As Object, Optional Arg10 As Object, Optional Arg11 As Object, Optional Arg12 As Object, Optional Arg13 As Object, Optional Arg14 As Object, Optional Arg15 As Object, Optional Arg16 As Object, Optional Arg17 As Object, Optional Arg18 As Object, Optional Arg19 As Object, Optional Arg20 As Object, Optional Arg21 As Object, Optional Arg22 As Object, Optional Arg23 As Object, Optional Arg24 As Object, Optional Arg25 As Object, Optional Arg26 As Object, Optional Arg27 As Object, Optional Arg28 As Object, Optional Arg29 As Object, Optional Arg30 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Number1, number2 ... - 要计算其不对称度的 1 到 30 个参数。也可以不使用这种用逗号分隔参数的形式，而使用一个数组或一个对数组的引用。

span.span: Number1, number2 ... - 1 to 30 arguments for which you want to calculate skewness. You can also use a single array or a reference to an array instead of arguments separated by commas.

summary.span: 返回分布的不对称度。不对称度反映以其平均值为中心的分布的不对称程度。不对称度为正表示不对称部分的分布更趋向正值。不对称度为负表示不对称部分的分布更趋向负值。

span.span: Returns the skewness of a distribution. Skewness characterizes the degree of asymmetry of a distribution around its mean. Positive skewness indicates a distribution with an asymmetric tail extending toward more positive values. Negative skewness indicates a distribution with an asymmetric tail extending toward more negative values.

para.span: 参数可以是数字，也可以是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: Arguments can either be numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 直接键入参数列表的数字的逻辑值和文本表示也包括在内。

span.span: Logical values and text representations of numbers that you type directly into the list of arguments are counted.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但含有零值的单元格包括在内。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: 如果参数为错误值或不能转换为数字的文本，则将导致错误。

span.span: Arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers cause errors.

para.span: 如果数据点少于三个，或者样本标准偏差为零 ，Skew 将返回 #DIV/0！

span.span: If there are fewer than three data points, or the sample standard deviation is zero, Skew returns the #DIV/0!
error value.

para.span: 不对称度的计算公式定义如下：

span.span: The equation for skewness is defined as:

para.span: 图 1：不对称等式

span.span: Figure 1: Equation for skewness

span.span: Returns the skewness of a distribution based on a population: a characterization of the degree of asymmetry of a distribution around its mean.

summary.span: 返回根据 known_y's 和 known_x's 中的数据点拟合的线性回归直线的斜率。斜率为直线上任意两点的垂直距离与水平距离的比值，也就是回归直线的变化率。

span.span: Returns the slope of the linear regression line through data points in known_y's and known_x's. The slope is the vertical distance divided by the horizontal distance between any two points on the line, which is the rate of change along the regression line.

para.span: 参数必须是数字，或是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: 如果 known_y 和 known_x 为空或数据点数不同， 则 Slope 将返回#N/A 错误值。

span.span: If known_y's and known_x's are empty or have a different number of data points, Slope returns the #N/A error value.

error.

returns a value of 0.

param.span: number1,number2,... - 对应于总体样本的 1 到 30 个数字参数。也可以不使用这种用逗号分隔参数的形式，而使用一个数组或一个对数组的引用。

span.span: Number1, number2, ... - 1 to 30 number arguments corresponding to a sample of a population. You can also use a single array or a reference to an array instead of arguments separated by commas.

summary.span: 基于样本估算标准偏差。标准偏差反映数值相对于平均值 (mean) 的离散程度。

span.span: Estimates standard deviation based on a sample. The standard deviation is a measure of how widely values are dispersed from the average value (the mean).

para.span: 重要说明：此函数已被替换为一个或多个新函数，这些函数可提供更高的准确性，并且名称可以更好地反映其用法。

span.span: Important: This function has been replaced with one or more new functions that may provide improved accuracy and whose names better reflect their usage.

para.span: 此函数仍可用于与早期版本的 Excel 兼容。

span.span: This function is still available for compatibility with earlier versions of Excel.

para.span: 但是，如果不需要向后兼容性，则应考虑从现在开始使用新函数，因为它们可以更准确地描述其功能。

span.span: However, if backward compatibility is not required, you should consider using the new functions from now on, because they more accurately describe their functionality.

para.span: 有关新函数的信息，请参阅 方法。

span.span: For more information about the new function, see the method.

para.span: StDev 假定其参数是总体的一个示例。

span.span: StDev assumes that its arguments are a sample of the population.

para.span: 如果数据代表整个总体，则使用 StDev 计算标准偏差。

span.span: If your data represents the entire population, then compute the standard deviation using StDev.

para.span: 标准偏差的计算使用“无偏差”或“n-1”方法。

span.span: The standard deviation is calculated using the "unbiased" or "n-1" method.

para.span: 参数可以是数字，也可以是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: Arguments can either be numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 直接键入到参数列表中的逻辑值和数字的文本表示形式也计算在内。

span.span: Logical values and text representations of numbers that you type directly into the list of arguments are counted.

para.span: 如果参数是一个数组或引用，则只计算该数组或引用中的数字。数组或引用中的空单元格、逻辑值、文本或错误值将被忽略。

span.span: If an argument is an array or reference, only numbers in that array or reference are counted. Empty cells, logical values, text, or error values in the array or reference are ignored.

para.span: 如果参数为错误值或不能转换为数字的文本，则将导致错误。

span.span: Arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers cause errors.

span.span: where x is the sample mean AVERAGE(number1,number2,…) and n is the sample size.

para.span: 有关新函数的信息，请参阅 方法。

span.span: For more information about the new function, see the method.

para.span: StDevP 假定其参数为整个总体。

span.span: StDevP assumes that its arguments are the entire population.

para.span: 如果数据代表总体的样本，则使用 计算标准偏差 。

span.span: If your data represents a sample of the population, then compute the standard deviation using .

para.span: 对于较大的样本大小 ，StDevP 将返回近似相等的值。

span.span: For large sample sizes, and StDevP return approximately equal values.

para.span: 此处标准偏差的计算使用“有偏差”或“n”方法。

span.span: The standard deviation is calculated using the "biased" or "n" method.

para.span: 参数可以是数字，也可以是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: Arguments can either be numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 直接键入到参数列表中的逻辑值和数字的文本表示形式也计算在内。

span.span: Logical values, and text representations of numbers that you type directly into the list of arguments are counted.

para.span: 如果参数是一个数组或引用，则只计算该数组或引用中的数字。数组或引用中的空单元格、逻辑值、文本或错误值将被忽略。

span.span: If an argument is an array or reference, only numbers in that array or reference are counted. Empty cells, logical values, text, or error values in the array or reference are ignored.

para.span: 如果参数为错误值或不能转换为数字的文本，则将导致错误。

span.span: Arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers cause errors.

para.span: StDevP 使用以下公式：

Public Function StEyx (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object) As Double
public: double StEyx(System::Object ^ Arg1, System::Object ^ Arg2);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Known_y's - 相关数据点的数组或区域。

span.span: Known_y's - an array or range of dependent data points.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Known_x's - 独立数据点的数组或区域。

span.span: Known_x's - an array or range of independent data points.

summary.span: 返回通过线性回归法计算每个 x 的 y 预测值时所产生的标准误差。标准误差用来度量根据单个 x 变量计算出的 y 预测值的误差量。

span.span: Returns the standard error of the predicted y-value for each x in the regression. The standard error is a measure of the amount of error in the prediction of y for an individual x.

para.span: 参数可以是数字，也可以是包含数字的名称、数组或引用。

span.span: Arguments can either be numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

para.span: 直接键入参数列表的数字的逻辑值和文本表示也包括在内。

span.span: Logical values and text representations of numbers that you type directly into the list of arguments are counted.

para.span: 如果数组或引用参数包含文本、逻辑值或空单元格，则这些值将被忽略；但含有零值的单元格包括在内。

span.span: If an array or reference argument contains text, logical values, or empty cells, those values are ignored; however, cells with the value zero are included.

para.span: 如果参数为错误值或不能转换为数字的文本，则将导致错误。

span.span: Arguments that are error values or text that cannot be translated into numbers cause errors.

para.span: 如果 known_y 和 known_x 的数据点数不同 ，StEyx 将返回 #N/A 错误值。

span.span: If known_y's and known_x's have a different number of data points, StEyx returns the #N/A error value.

para.span: 如果 known_y 和 known_x 为空或数据点少于三个 ，StEyx 将返回 #DIV/0！

span.span: If known_y's and known_x's are empty or have less than three data points, StEyx returns the #DIV/0!
error value.

para.span: 预测 y 的标准错误公式为：

span.span: The equation for the standard error of the predicted y is:

para.span: 图 1：预测 y 的标准错误的等式

span.span: Figure 1: Equation for the standard error of the predicted y

para.span: 其中 x 和 y 是样本平均值 AVERAGE (known_x 的) 和 AVERAGE (known_y 的) ，n 表示样本大小。

span.span: where x and y are the sample means AVERAGE(known_x’s) and AVERAGE(known_y’s), and n is the sample size.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Text - 要替换其中字符的文本，或对含有要替换其中字符的文本的单元格的引用。

span.span: Text - the text or the reference to a cell containing text for which you want to substitute characters.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: old_text - 要替换的文本。

span.span: Old_text - the text you want to replace.

param.name: Arg3

span.span: Instance_num - specifies which occurrence of old_text you want to replace with new_text. If you specify instance_num, only that instance of old_text is replaced. Otherwise, every occurrence of old_text in text is changed to new_text.

summary.span: 在文本字符串中用 new_text 替代 old_text。如果需要在某一文本字符串中替换指定的文本，请使用函数 SUBSTITUTE；如果需要在某一文本字符串中替换指定位置处的任意文本，请使用函数 REPLACE。

span.span: Substitutes new_text for old_text in a text string. Use SUBSTITUTE when you want to replace specific text in a text string; use REPLACE when you want to replace any text that occurs in a specific location in a text string.

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Range - 要按条件求值单元格区域。

span.span: Range - the range of cells that you want evaluated by criteria.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Criteria - 定义哪些单元格将被相加求和的条件，其形式可以为数字、表达式或文本。

span.span: Criteria - the criteria in the form of a number, expression, or text that defines which cells will be added.

param.span: 例如，条件可以表示为 32、"32"、"32" > 或"apples"。

span.span: For example, criteria can be expressed as 32, "32", ">32", or "apples".

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Sum_range - 要相加的实际单元格（如果 range 中对应的单元格符合条件）。如果省略 sum_range，则将根据条件对 range 中的单元格进行计算，并在符合条件的情况下对它们相加求和。

span.span: Sum_range - the actual cells to add if their corresponding cells in range match criteria. If sum_range is omitted, the cells in range are both evaluated by criteria and added if they match criteria.

summary.span: 根据给定条件对指定单元格求和。

span.span: Adds the cells specified by a given criteria.

para.span: Sum_range 的大小和形状不必与 range 相同。实际进行相加求和的单元格确定方法如下：将 sum_range 中左上角的单元格作为开始单元格，然后将与 range 的大小和形状对应的单元格包含到其中。例如：

span.span: Sum_range does not have to be the same size and shape as range. The actual cells that are added are determined by using the top, left cell in sum_range as the beginning cell, and then including cells that correspond in size and shape to range. For example:
A1:A5
B1:B5
B1:B5
A1:A5
B1:B3
B1:B5
A1:B4
C1:D4
C1:D4
A1:B4
C1:C2
C1:D4

para.span: 可以在 criteria 中使用通配符，包括问号 (?) 和星号 (\*)。问号可匹配任意的单个字符；星号可匹配任意一串字符。如果要查找实际的问号或星号，则请在该字符前键入一个波形符 (~)。

span.span: You can use the wildcard characters, question mark (?) and asterisk (\*), in criteria. A question mark matches any single character; an asterisk matches any sequence of characters. If you want to find an actual question mark or asterisk, type a tilde (~) preceding the character.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 T_Dist_RT([in]float64 Arg1, [in]float64 Arg2) runtime managed
Public Function T_Dist_RT (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Double) As Double
public: double T_Dist_RT(double Arg1, double Arg2);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: x - 用于计算分布的值。

span.span: X - The numeric value at which to evaluate the distribution.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: degrees_freedom - 表示自由度数的整数。

span.span: Degrees_freedom - An integer that indicates the number of degrees of freedom.

summary.span: 返回学生的右尾 t 分布，其中数值 (x) 是 t 的计算值（将计算其百分点）。t 分布用于小样本数据集的假设检验。使用此函数可以代替 t 分布的临界值表。

span.span: Returns the right-tailed Student t-distribution where a numeric value (x) is a calculated value of t for which the Percentage Points are to be computed. The t-distribution is used in the hypothesis testing of small sample data sets. Use this function in place of a table of critical values for the t-distribution.

para.span: 如果任一参数为非数值型，则 T_Dist_RT 返回#VALUE！

span.span: If any argument is non-numeric, T_Dist_RT returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果degrees_freedom < 1，则 T_Dist_RT 返回#NUM！

span.span: If degrees_freedom < 1, T_Dist_RT returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 参数 degrees_freedom 和 tails 将被截尾取整。

span.span: The degrees_freedom and tails arguments are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 tails 是除 1 或 2 外的任何值，T_Dist_RT 返回 #NUM！

span.span: If tails is any value other than 1 or 2, T_Dist_RT returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 x < 0，则 T_Dist_RT 返回#NUM！

span.span: If x < 0, then T_Dist_RT returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 tails = 1，则 T_Dist_RT 的计算公式为 T_DIST_RT = P ( X x ) ，其中 X 是遵循 t 分布的随机 > 变量。

span.span: If tails = 1, T_Dist_RT is calculated as T_DIST_RT = P( X>x ), where X is a random variable that follows the t-distribution.

para.span: 如果 tails = 2，T_Dist_RT 计算为 T_DIST_RT = P (|X| > x) = P (X > x 或 X < -x) 。

span.span: If tails = 2, T_Dist_RT is calculated as T_DIST_RT = P(|X| > x) = P(X > x or X < -x).

para.span: 由于不允许 x 0，因此在 x 0 时使用 < T_Dist_RT， 请注意 < ，T_DIST_RT (-x，df) = 1 – T_DIST_RT (x，df) = P (X > -x) ，T_DIST_2T (-x，df) = T_DIST_2T (x df) = P (|X| > x) 。

span.span: Because x < 0 is not allowed, to use T_Dist_RT when x < 0, note that T_DIST_RT(-x,df) = 1 – T_DIST_RT(x,df) = P(X > -x) and T_DIST_2T(-x,df) = T_DIST_2T(x df) = P(|X| > x).

span.span: If either argument is non-numeric, T_Inv_2T returns the #VALUE!
error value.

span.span: If degrees_freedom is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果degrees_freedom < 1，则 T_Inv_2T 返回#NUM！

error value.

para.span: T_Inv_2T 返回该值 t，这样 P (|X|t) = probability，其中 X 是遵循 t 分布和 P 分布的随机 > (|X| > t) = P (X < -t 或 X > t) 。

span.span: T_Inv_2T returns that value t, such that P(|X| > t) = probability where X is a random variable that follows the t-distribution and P(|X| > t) = P(X < -t or X > t).

para.span: 单尾 t 值可通过将 probability 替换为 2 probability 来 *返回。对于概率为 0.05 且自由度为 10，双尾值的计算公式为 T_INV_2T (0.05，10) ，返回 2.28139。同* 一概率和自由度的单尾值可通过 T_INV_2T (2 0.05，10) 计算，返回 1.812462。

span.span: A one-tailed t-value can be returned by replacing probability with 2 *probability. For a probability of 0.05 and degrees of freedom of 10, the two-tailed value is calculated with T_INV_2T(0.05,10), which returns 2.28139. The one-tailed value for the same probability and degrees of freedom can be calculated with T_INV_2T(2* 0.05,10), which returns 1.812462.

para.span: 注意：在某些表中，概率描述为 (1-p) 。

span.span: Note: In some tables, probability is described as (1-p).

para.span: 给定概率值 T_Inv_2T 求值 x，T_DIST_RT (x、degrees_freedom、2) = probability。

span.span: Given a value for probability T_Inv_2T seeks that value x such that T_DIST_RT(x, degrees_freedom, 2) = probability.

para.span: 因此 ，T_Inv_2T取决于 的精度 。

span.span: Thus, precision of T_Inv_2T depends on precision of .

para.span: T_Inv_2T 迭代搜索技术。

span.span: T_Inv_2T uses an iterative search technique.

para.span: 如果搜索在 100 次迭代之后没有收敛，则该函数将返回错误值 #N/A。

span.span: If the search has not converged after 100 iterations, the function returns the #N/A error value.

param.name: Arg1

param.name: Arg4
param.span: type - 要执行的 t 检验的种类。

span.span: Type - The kind of t-Test to perform.

summary.span: 返回与学生 t 检验相关的概率。可以使用 T_TEST 判断两个样本是否可能来自两个具有相同平均值的基础总体。

span.span: Returns the probability associated with a Student t-Test. Use T_TEST to determine whether two samples are likely to have come from the same two underlying populations that have the same mean.

para.span: 如果 array1 和 array2 的数据点个数不同，并且类型 = 1 (成对 ) ，T_Test 返回 #N/A 错误值。

span.span: If array1 and array2 have a different number of data points, and type = 1 (paired), T_Test returns the #N/A error value.

para.span: 参数 tails 和 type 将被截尾取整。

span.span: The tails and type arguments are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 tails 或 type 为非数值型，则 T_Test 返回#VALUE！

span.span: If tails or type is non-numeric, T_Test returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 tails 是除 1 或 2 外的任何值，T_Test 返回 #NUM！

span.span: If tails is any value other than 1 or 2, T_Test returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: T_Test array1 和 array2 中的数据来计算非负 t 统计值。

span.span: T_Test uses the data in array1 and array2 to compute a non-negative t-statistic.

para.span: 如果 tails=1，T_Test假定 array1 和 array2 是来自具有相同平均值的样本的样本，则返回 t 统计值较高的概率。

span.span: If tails=1, T_Test returns the probability of a higher value of the t-statistic under the assumption that array1 and array2 are samples from populations with the same mean.

para.span: 当 tails=2 时，T_Test 返回的值是 tails=1 时返回的两倍，并且对应于在"相同总体均值"假设下 t 统计的较高绝对值的概率。

span.span: The value returned by T_Test when tails=2 is double that returned when tails=1 and corresponds to the probability of a higher absolute value of the t-statistic under the “same population means” assumption.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: Settlement 和 maturity 将截尾取整。

span.span: Settlement and maturity are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 settlement 或 maturity 不是有效日期， 则 TBillEq 将返回#VALUE！

span.span: If settlement or maturity is not a valid date, TBillEq returns the #VALUE!
error value.

para.span: 如果 discount ≤ 0， 则 TBillEq 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If discount ≤ 0, TBillEq returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: 如果 settlement maturity 或 maturity 在 settlement 之后超过一年， > 则 TBillEq 将返回#NUM！

span.span: If settlement > maturity, or if maturity is more than one year after settlement, TBillEq returns the #NUM!
error value.

para.span: TBillEq 的计算公式为 TBILLEQ = (365 x rate) / (360- (rate x DSM) ) ，其中 DSM 是根据每年 360 天计算的结算日与到期日之间的天数。

span.span: TBillEq is calculated as TBILLEQ = (365 x rate)/(360-(rate x DSM)), where DSM is the number of days between settlement and maturity computed according to the 360 days per year basis.
